definitionList.name: RESET
descriptionList:
This message is sent by both the gNB-CU and
the gNB-DU and is used to request that the F1 interface, or parts of the F1
interface, to be reset.
definitionList.direction: Direction: gNB-CU → gNB-DU and gNB-DU → gNB-CU

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  of UE-associated logical F1-connections allowed to reset in one message.
  Value is 65536.

definitionList.name: RESET ACKNOWLEDGE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by both the gNB-CU and
the gNB-DU as a response to a RESET message.
definitionList.direction: Direction: gNB-DU → gNB-CU and gNB-CU → gNB-DU.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  of UE-associated logical F1-connections allowed to reset in one message.
  Value is 65536.

definitionList.name: ERROR INDICATION
descriptionList:
This message is sent by both the gNB-CU and
the gNB-DU and is used to indicate that some error has been detected in the
node.
definitionList.direction: Direction: gNB-CU → gNB-DU and gNB-DU → gNB-CU

elementList.name: Transaction ID
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if received in UE associated signalling message.

definitionList.name: F1 SETUP REQUEST
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
transfer information associated to an F1-C interface instance.

NOTE:      If a TNL association is shared among several
F1-C interface instances, several F1 Setup procedures are issued via the same
TNL association after that TNL association has become operational.

elementList.name: Served Cell Information

elementList.description: RRC container with system information owned by gNB-DU

elementList.name: BAP Address
elementList.description: Indicates a BAP address assigned to the IAB-node.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  cells that can be served by a gNB-DU. Value is 512.

transfer information associated to an F1-C interface instance.

definitionList.name: GNB-CU CONFIGURATION UPDATE FAILURE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
indicate gNB-CU Configuration Update failure.

definitionList.name: GNB-DU RESOURCE COORDINATION REQUEST
descriptionList:
This message is sent by a gNB-CU to a
gNB-DU, to express the desired resource allocation for data traffic, for the
sake of resource coordination. The message triggers
gNB-DU resource coordination (for NR-initiated resource coordination), to
indicate an initial resource offer by the E-UTRA node (for E-UTRA-initiated
gNB-DU Resource Coordination), or to indicate the agreed resource allocation
that is to be executed.

elementList.name: E-UTRA – NR Cell Resource Coordination Request Container
elementList.description: Includes the X2AP E-UTRA – NR CELL RESOURCE COORDINATION REQUEST message as defined in subclause 9.1.4.24 in TS 36.423 [9].

definitionList.name: GNB-DU RESOURCE COORDINATION RESPONSE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by a gNB-DU to a
gNB-CU, to express the desired resource allocation for data traffic, as a
response to the GNB-DU RESOURCE COORDINATION REQUEST.

elementList.name: E-UTRA – NR Cell Resource Coordination Response Container
elementList.description: Includes the X2AP E-UTRA – NR CELL RESOURCE COORDINATION RESPONSE message as defined in subclause 9.1.4.25 in TS 36.423 [9].

definitionList.name: GNB-DU STATUS INDICATION
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
indicate to the gNB-CU its status of overload.

definitionList.name: F1 REMOVAL REQUEST
descriptionList:
This message is sent by either the gNB-DU
or the gNB-CU to intiate the removal of the interface instance and the related
resources.
definitionList.direction: Direction: gNB-DU à gNB-CU, gNB-CU à gNB-DU.

definitionList.name: F1 REMOVAL RESPONSE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by either the gNB-DU
or the gNB-CU to acknowledge the initiation of removal of the interface
instance and the related resources.
definitionList.direction: Direction: gNB-CU à gNB-DU, gNB-DU à gNB-CU.

definitionList.name: F1 REMOVAL FAILURE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by either the gNB-DU
or the gNB-CU to indicate that removing the interface instance and the related
resources cannot be accepted.
definitionList.direction: Direction: gNB-CU à gNB-DU, gNB-DU à gNB-CU.

definitionList.name: NETWORK ACCESS RATE REDUCTION
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to
indicate to the gNB-DU a need to reduce the rate at which UEs access the
network.

definitionList.name: RESOURCE STATUS REQUEST
descriptionList:
This message is sent by gNB-CU to gNB-DU to
initiate the requested measurement according to the parameters given in the
message.

elementList.name: gNB-CU Measurement ID
elementList.description: Allocated by gNB-CU

elementList.name: gNB-DU Measurement ID
elementList.description: Allocated by gNB-DU

elementList.name: Registration Request
elementList.description: Type of request for which the resource status is required.

elementList.name: Report Characteristics
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap indicates measurement object the gNB-DU is requested to report. First Bit = PRB Periodic, Second Bit = TNL Capacity Ind Periodic, Third Bit = Composite Available Capacity Periodic, Fourth Bit = HW LoadInd Periodic, Fifth Bit = Number of Active UEs, Sixth Bit = NR-U Channel List. Other bits shall be ignored by the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: Cell To Report List
elementList.description: Cell ID list to which the request applies.

elementList.name: SSB To Report List
elementList.description: SSB list to which the request applies.

elementList.name: Slice To Report List
elementList.description: S-NSSAI list to which the request applies.

elementList.name: PLMN Identity
elementList.description: Broadcast PLMN

elementList.name: Reporting Periodicity
elementList.description: Periodicity that can be used for reporting of PRB Periodic, TNL Capacity Ind Periodic, Composite Available Capacity Periodic. Also used as the averaging window length for all measurement object if supported.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. cells that can be served by a
  gNB-DU. Value is 512.

Maximum no. SSB Areas that can be served by a gNB
  node cell. Value is 64.

Maximum no. of signalled slice support items.
  Value is 1024.

Maximum no. of PLMN Ids.broadcast in a cell.
  Value is 12.

conditionList.explanation:
This IE shall be present if the Registration
  Request IE is set to the value "stop" or "add".

This IE shall be present if the Registration
  Request IE is set to the value "start".

definitionList.name: RESOURCE STATUS RESPONSE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by gNB-DU to gNB-CU to
indicate that the requested measurement is successfully initiated.

elementList.name: gNB-CU Measurement ID
elementList.description: Allocated by gNB-CU

elementList.name: gNB-DU Measurement ID
elementList.description: Allocated by gNB-DU

definitionList.name: RESOURCE STATUS FAILURE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by gNB-DU to gNB-CU to
indicate that for any of the requested measurement objects the measurement cannot
be initiated.

elementList.name: gNB-CU Measurement ID
elementList.description: Allocated by gNB-CU

elementList.name: gNB-DU Measurement ID
elementList.description: Allocated by gNB-DU

definitionList.name: RESOURCE STATUS UPDATE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by gNB-DU to gNB-CU to
report the results of the requested measurements.

elementList.name: gNB-CU Measurement ID
elementList.description: Allocated by gNB-CU

elementList.name: gNB-DU Measurement ID
elementList.description: Allocated by gNB-DU

elementList.name: NR-U Channel ID
elementList.description: Identifies a portion of the NR-U Channel Bandwidth on which channel access procedure in shared spectrum has been performed in the last reporting period.

elementList.name: Channel occupancy time percentage
elementList.description: The percentage of time for which the channel resources have been utilised for DL traffic served by the corresponding cell. Value 100 corresponds to the duration between consecutive reporting.

elementList.name: Energy Detection Threshold
elementList.description: Average ED Threshold used for DL channel sensing. Value is in dBm.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. cells that can be served by a gNB-DU.
  Value is 512.

Maximum no. NR-U Channel IDs in a cell. Value
  is 4.

Maximum no. of UEs that can be served by a
  gNB-DU. Value is 65536.

definitionList.name: PWS CANCEL REQUEST
descriptionList:
This message is forwarded by the gNB-CU to
gNB-DU to cancel an already ongoing broadcast of a warning message

elementList.name: Number of Broadcasts Requested
elementList.description: This IE is not used in this version of the specification

elementList.name: Cell Broadcast To Be Cancelled List
Cell Broadcast to Be Cancelled Item IEs
Cancel-all Warning Messages Indicator
elementList.description: ENUMERATED (true, ...)

elementList.name: Notification Information
elementList.description: This IE is ignored If the Cancel-all Warning Messages Indicator IE is included.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. cells that can be served by a gNB-DU. Value is 512.

definitionList.name: PWS CANCEL RESPONSE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
indicate the list of warning areas where cancellation of the broadcast of the
identified message was successful and unsuccessful.

elementList.name: Number of Broadcasts
elementList.description: This IE is set to ‘0’ if valid results are not known or not available. It is set to 65535 if the counter results have overflowed.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of cells that can be served by a
  gNB-DU. Value is 512.

definitionList.name: PWS RESTART INDICATION
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
inform the gNB-CU that PWS information for some or all cells of the gNB-DU are
available if needed.

elementList.name: NR CGI List for Restart List
NR CGI List for Restart Item IEs

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of cells that can be served by a
  gNB-DU. Value is 512.

definitionList.name: PWS FAILURE INDICATION
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
inform the gNB-CU that ongoing PWS operation for one or more cells of the
gNB-DU has failed.

elementList.name: PWS failed NR CGI Item IEs
Number of Broadcasts
elementList.description: This IE is not used in the specification and is ignored.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of cells that can be served by a
  gNB-DU. Value is 512.

definitionList.name: SYSTEM INFORMATION DELIVERY COMMAND
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU and is
used to enable the gNB-DU to
broadcast the requested other SI.

elementList.name: NR CGI
elementList.description: NR cell identifier

definitionList.name: PAGING
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-CU and is used to request the gNB-DU to page UEs.

elementList.name: Paging DRX
elementList.description: It is defined as the minimum between the RAN UE Paging DRX and CN UE Paging DRX

elementList.name: RAN UE Paging DRX
elementList.description: This IE indicates the RAN paging cycle as defined in TS 38.304 [24].

elementList.name: CN UE Paging DRX
elementList.description: This IE indicates the UE specific paging cycle as defined in TS 38.304 [24].

elementList.name: NR Paging eDRX Information for RRC INACTIVE

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of paging
  cells, the maximum value is 512.

definitionList.name: TRACE START
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to
initiate a trace session for a UE.

definitionList.name: DEACTIVATE TRACE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to
deactivate a trace session.

elementList.name: Trace ID
elementList.description: As per Trace ID in Trace Activation IE

definitionList.name: CELL TRAFFIC TRACE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to to transfer
trace specific information.

elementList.name: Trace ID
elementList.description: This IE is composed of the following: Trace Reference defined in TS 32.422 [29] (leftmost 6 octets, with PLMN information encoded as in 9.3.1.14), and Trace Recording Session Reference defined in TS 32.422 [29] (last 2 octets).

elementList.name: Trace Collection Entity IP Address
elementList.description: For File based Reporting. Defined in TS 32.422 [29]. Should be ignored if URI is present

elementList.name: Trace Collection Entity URI
elementList.description: For Streaming based Reporting. Defined in TS 32.422 [11] Replaces Trace Collection Entity IP Address if present

definitionList.name: DU-CU RADIO INFORMATION TRANSFER
descriptionList:
This message is sent by a gNB-DU to a
gNB-CU, to convey radio-related information.

definitionList.name: CU-DU RADIO INFORMATION TRANSFER
descriptionList:
This message is sent by a gNB-CU to a gNB-DU,
to convey radio-related information.

definitionList.name: BAP MAPPING CONFIGURATION
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to provide the backhaul routing information and/or
traffic mapping information to the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: BH Routing Information Added List Item
Next-Hop BAP Address
elementList.description: Indicates the BAP address of the next hop IAB-node or IAB-donor-DU.

elementList.name: Non-F1-Terminating Topology Indicator
elementList.description: If present, indicates that the routing entry applies to the non-F1-terminating topology of the boundary IAB-node.

elementList.name: BH Routing Information Removed List Item
Buffer Size Threshold
elementList.description: The buffer size threshold (in bytes) for DL local rerouting, triggered by hop-by-hop flow control feedback.

elementList.name: Non-F1-terminating Topology Indicator
elementList.description: If present, indicates that the egress BAP Routing ID in the present BAP header rewriting entry pertains to the non-F1-terminating topology of the boundary IAB-node.

elementList.name: Re-Routing Disable Indicator
elementList.description: If present, indicates that the inter-donor-DU rerouting is disabled.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of routing
  entries, the maximum value is 1024.

definitionList.name: BAP MAPPING CONFIGURATION ACKNOWLEDGE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-DU as a response to a BAP MAPPING CONFIGURATION message.

definitionList.name: BAP MAPPING CONFIGURATION FAILURE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
indicate a BAP Mapping Configuration Update failure.

definitionList.name: GNB-DU RESOURCE CONFIGURATION
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to
provide the resource configuration for an gNB-DU.

elementList.name: Activated Cells to Be Updated List
elementList.description: List of activated cells served by the IAB-DU or the IAB-donor-DU whose resource configuration is updated

elementList.name: Activated Cells To Be Updated List Item
gNB-DU Cell Resource Configuration-TDD
elementList.description: Contains TDD resource configuration of the gNB-DU’s cell.

elementList.name: gNB-DU Cell Resource Configuration-FDD-UL
elementList.description: Contains FDD UL resource configuration of the gNB-DU’s cell.

elementList.name: gNB-DU Cell Resource Configuration-FDD-DL
elementList.description: Contains FDD DL resource configuration of the gNB-DU’s cell.

elementList.name: Child-Nodes List
elementList.description: List of child IAB-nodes served by the IAB-DU or IAB-donor-DU.

elementList.name: gNB-CU UE F1AP ID
elementList.description: Identifier of a descendant node IAB-MT at the IAB-donor-CU.

elementList.name: gNB-DU UE F1AP ID
elementList.description: Identifier of a child-node IAB-MT at an IAB-DU or IAB-donor-DU.

elementList.name: Child-Node Cells List
elementList.description: List of cells served by the child-node IAB-DU whose resource configuration is updated.

elementList.name: gNB-DU Cell Resource Configuration-TDD
elementList.description: Contains TDD resource configuration of gNB-DU’s cell.

elementList.name: NR Carrier List
elementList.description: If included, the Transmission Bandwidth IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: gNB-DU Cell Resource Configuration-FDD-UL
elementList.description: Contains FDD UL resource configuration of gNB-DU’s cell.

elementList.name: gNB-DU Cell Resource Configuration-FDD-DL
elementList.description: Contains FDD DL resource configuration of gNB-DU’s cell.

elementList.name: UL NR Carrier List
elementList.description: If included, the UL Transmission Bandwidth IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: DL NR Carrier List
elementList.description: If included, the DL Transmission Bandwidth IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: IAB STC Info
elementList.description: STC configuration of child-node IAB-DU’s cell.

elementList.name: RACH Config Common
elementList.description: Corresponds to the rach-ConfigCommon as defined in subclause 6.3.2 of TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: RACH Config Common IAB
elementList.description: Corresponds to the IAB-specific rach-ConfigCommonIAB-r16 as defined in subclause 6.3.2 of TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: CSI-RS Configuration
elementList.description: Corresponds to the NZP-CSI-RS-Resource as defined in subclause 6.3.2 of TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SR Configuration
elementList.description: Corresponds to the SchedulingRequestResourceConfig as defined in subclause 6.3.2 of TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: PDCCH Configuration SIB1
elementList.description: Corresponds to the PDCCH-ConfigSIB1 as defined in subclause 6.3.2 of TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SCS Common
elementList.description: Corresponds to the subCarrierSpacingCommon as defined in subclause 6.2.2 of TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Multiplexing Info
elementList.description: Contains information on multiplexing with cells configured for collocated IAB-MT.

elementList.name: Neighbour-Node Cells List
elementList.description: List of neighbor node cells.

elementList.name: gNB-CU UE F1AP ID
elementList.description: Identifier of a child-node IAB-MT at an IAB-donor-CU.

elementList.name: gNB-DU UE F1AP ID
elementList.description: Identifier of a child-node IAB-MT at an IAB-DU or IAB-donor-DU.

elementList.name: Peer Parent-Node Indicator
elementList.description: Indicates if the cell is served by abelongs to the peer parent IAB-node of the boundary IAB-node.

elementList.name: gNB-DU Cell Resource Configuration-TDD
elementList.description: Contains TDD resource configuration of neighbor gNB-DU’s cell or peer parent IAB-node’s cell.

elementList.name: Carrier List
elementList.description: If included, the Transmission Bandwidth IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: gNB-DU Cell Resource Configuration-FDD-UL
elementList.description: Contains FDD UL resource configuration of neighbor gNB-DU’s cell or peer parent-node’s cell.

elementList.name: gNB-DU Cell Resource Configuration-FDD-DL
elementList.description: Contains FDD DL resource configuration of neighbor gNB-DU’s cell or peer parent-node’s cell.

elementList.name: UL Carrier List
elementList.description: If included, the UL Transmission Bandwidth IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: DL Carrier List
elementList.description: If included, the UL Transmission Bandwidth IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: IAB STC Info
elementList.description: STC configuration of peer parent-node IAB-DU’s cell.

elementList.name: RACH Config Common
elementList.description: Common RACH Configuration of peer parent node IAB-DU’s cell. Corresponds to the rach-ConfigCommon as defined in subclause 6.3.2 of TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: RACH Config Common IAB
elementList.description: IAB specific common RACH Configuration of peer parent node IAB-DU’s cell. Corresponds to the IAB-specific rach-ConfigCommonIAB-r16 as defined in subclause 6.3.2 of TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: CSI-RS Configuration
elementList.description: CSI-RS configuration of peer parent node IAB-DU’s cell. Corresponds to the NZP-CSI-RS-Resource as defined in subclause 6.3.2 of TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SR Configuration
elementList.description: SR configuration of peer parent node IAB-DU’s cell. Corresponds to the SchedulingRequestResourceConfig as defined in subclause 6.3.2 of TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: PDCCH Configuration SIB1
elementList.description: PDCCH configuration SIB1 of peer parent node IAB-DU’s cell. Corresponds to the PDCCH-ConfigSIB1 as defined in subclause 6.3.2 of TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SCS Common
elementList.description: SCS Common of peer parent node IAB-DU’s cell. Corresponds to the subCarrierSpacingCommon as defined in subclause 6.2.2 of TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Serving Cells List
elementList.description: List of serving cells of the collocated IAB-MT.

elementList.name: CHOICE IAB-MT Cell NA Resource Configuration-Mode-Info
gNB-DU Cell NA Resource Configuration-TDD
elementList.description: Contains TDD NA resource configuration of parent IAB-node’s cell for the collocated IAB-MT.

elementList.name: Carrier List
elementList.description: If included, the Transmission Bandwidth IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: gNB-DU Cell NA Resource Configuration-FDD-UL
elementList.description: Contains FDD UL NA resource configuration of parent IAB-node’s cell for the collocated IAB-MT.

elementList.name: gNB-DU Cell NA Resource Configuration-FDD-DL
elementList.description: Contains FDD DL NA resource configuration of parent IAB-node’s cell for the collocated IAB-MT.

elementList.name: UL Carrier List
elementList.description: If included, the UL Transmission Bandwidth IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: DL Carrier List
elementList.description: If included, the UL Transmission Bandwidth IE shall be ignored.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum number of child nodes served by an
  IAB-DU or IAB-donor-DU. Value is 1024.

Maximum number of cells served by an IAB-DU or IAB-donor-DU.
  Value is 512.
Maximum no. of neighbour cells. Value is 1024.

definitionList.name: GNB-DU RESOURCE CONFIGURATION ACKNOWLEDGE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
acknowledge the reception of an GNB-DU RESOURCE CONFIGURATION message.

definitionList.name: GNB-DU RESOURCE CONFIGURATION FAILURE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
indicate a gNB-DU Resource Configuration Update failure.

definitionList.name: IAB TNL ADDRESS REQUEST
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to request
the allocation of IP addresses for IAB-node(s).

elementList.name: IAB TNL Addresses To Remove List
IAB TNL Addresses To Remove Item

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of individual IPv4/IPv6 addresses
  or IPv6 address prefixes that can be allocated in one procedure execution. The
  value is 1024.

definitionList.name: IAB TNL ADDRESS RESPONSE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
indicate the TNL addresses allocated to IAB-node(s).

elementList.name: IAB TNL Address Usage
elementList.description: The usage of the allocated IPv4 or IPv6 address or IPv6 address prefix.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of IPv6 addresses or IPv6 address
  prefixes and/or individual IPv4 addresses that can be allocated in one
  procedure execution. The value is 1024.

definitionList.name: IAB TNL ADDRESS FAILURE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
indicate an IAB TNL Address Allocation failure.

definitionList.name: IAB UP CONFIGURATION UPDATE REQUEST
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to provide
the updated UL BH Information or the updated UL UP TNL Information/Address to
the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: UL UP TNL Information to Update List
UL UP TNL Information to Update List Item IEs
UL UP TNL Information
elementList.description: This field indicates the UL UP TNL Information used before configuration update.

elementList.name: New UL UP TNL Information
elementList.description: If present, this field indicates the new UL UP TNL Information used after configuration update.

elementList.name: UL UP TNL Address to Update List
UL UP TNL Address to Update List Item IEs
Old TNL Address
elementList.description: The old UL UP Transport Layer Address of gNB-CU used for UL F1-U GTP Tunnel before the configuration update.

elementList.name: New TNL Address
elementList.description: The corresponding new UL UP Transport Layer Address that replaces the old one.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of UL UP TNL Information allowed
  towards one IAB node, the maximum value is 32768.

Maximum no. of TNL addresses for F1-U. Value is
  8.

definitionList.name: IAB UP CONFIGURATION UPDATE RESPONSE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
provide the updated TNL address(es) of the DL F1-U GTP tunnels to the gNB-CU.

elementList.name: DL UP TNL Address to Update List
DL UP TNL Address to Update List Item IEs
Old TNL Address
elementList.description: The old DL UP Transport Layer Address of gNB-DU used for DL F1-U GTP tunnel before the configuration update.

elementList.name: New TNL Address
elementList.description: The corresponding new Transport Layer Address used to replace the old one.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of TNL addresses for F1-U. Value is
  8.

definitionList.name: IAB UP CONFIGURATION UPDATE FAILURE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
indicate an IAB UP Configuration Update failure.

definitionList.name: ACCESS AND MOBILITY INDICATION
descriptionList:
This message is sent by gNB-CU to gNB-DU to provide access and mobility information to the
gNB-DU.

elementList.name: RACH Report Container
elementList.description: RA-ReportList-r16 IE as defined in subclause 6.2.2 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: NR UE RLF Report Container
elementList.description: nr-RLF-Report-r16 IE contained in the UEInformationResponse message defined in TS 38.331 [8].

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of RACH Reports, the
  maximum value is 64.

Maximum no.
  of RLF Reports, the maximum value is 64.

Maximum no.
  of Successful HO Reports, the maximum value is 64.

definitionList.name: REFERENCE TIME INFORMATION REPORTING CONTROL
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU and is
used to
request the gNB-DU to deliver the accurate reference time information.

definitionList.name: REFERENCE TIME INFORMATION REPORT
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU and is used to report the accurate
reference time information to
the gNB-CU.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING ASSISTANCE INFORMATION CONTROL
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to
transfer positioning assistance information.

elementList.name: Positioning Assistance Information
elementList.description: Contains the Assistance Information IE as defined in TS 38.455 [37].

elementList.name: Positioning Broadcast Cells
elementList.description: The cell(s) that are requested to broadcast posSIB(s) according to the Positioning Assistance Information IE.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING ASSISTANCE INFORMATION FEEDBACK
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to give
feedback on positioning assistance information broadcasting.

elementList.name: Positioning Assistance Information Failure List
elementList.description: Contains the Assistance Information IE as defined in TS 38.455 [37].

elementList.name: Positioning Broadcast Cells
elementList.description: The cells associated to the feedback provided in the Positioning Assistance Information Failure List IE.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING MEASUREMENT REQUEST
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to request
the gNB-DU to configure a positioning measurement.

elementList.name: NR CGI
elementList.description: The Cell ID of the TRP identified by the TRP ID IE.

elementList.name: Positioning Measurement Periodicity
elementList.description: The codepoint 120ms, 240ms, 480ms, 1024ms, 2048ms, 1min, 6min, 12min, and 30min are not applicable.

elementList.name: Positioning Measurement Type
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (gNB RX-TX, UL-SRS-RSRP, UL AoA, UL RTOA, …)

elementList.name: SFN Initialisation Time
elementList.description: If this IE is not present, the TRP may assume that the value is same as its own SFN initialisation time.

elementList.name: Measurement Beam Information Request
elementList.description: This IE is ignored when the Measurement characteristics Request Indicator IE is included.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of measured quantities that can be
  configured and reported with one message. Value is 16384.

Maximum no. of TRPs that can be included within
  one measurement message. Value is 64.

conditionList.explanation:
This IE shall be present if the Positioning Report
  Characteristics IE is set to the value "Periodic".

This IE shall be present if the Measurement
  Periodicity IE is set to the value "extended".

definitionList.name: POSITIONING MEASUREMENT RESPONSE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to report
positioning measurements for the target UE.

elementList.name: NR CGI
elementList.description: The Cell ID of the TRP identified by the TRP ID IE.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of TRP measurements that can be
  included within one message. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING MEASUREMENT FAILURE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to report
measurement failure.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING MEASUREMENT REPORT
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to report
positioning measurements for the target UE.

elementList.name: NR CGI
elementList.description: The Cell ID of the TRP identified by the TRP ID IE.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of TRP measurements that can be
  included within one message. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING MEASUREMENT ABORT
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to request
the gNB-DU to abort a positioning measurement.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING MEASUREMENT FAILURE INDICATION
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to indicate
that the previously requested positioning measurements can no longer be
reported.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING MEASUREMENT UPDATE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to
update a previously configured measurement.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maxmum no. of TRPs that can be included within
  one message. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: TRP INFORMATION REQUEST
descriptionList: This message is sent by a gNB-CU to request information for TRPs hosted by a gNB-DU.

elementList.name: TRP Information Type Item
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (nr pci, ng-ran cgi, nr arfcn, prs config, ssb config, sfn init time, spatial direction info, geo-coordinates, …, trp type, on-demand prs, trp Tx teg, beam antenna info)

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no of TRP information types that can be
  requested and reported with one message. Value is 64.
Maximum no. of TRPs in a gNB. Value is 65535.

definitionList.name: TRP INFORMATION RESPONSE
descriptionList: This message is sent by a gNB-DU to convey TRP information to a gNB-CU.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of TRPs in a gNB-DU. Value is 65535.

definitionList.name: TRP INFORMATION FAILURE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by a gNB-DU node to indicate that the requested TRP information cannot be
provided to a gNB-CU.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING INFORMATION REQUEST
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to
indicate to the gNB-DU the need to configure the UE to transmit SRS signals for
uplink positioning measurement.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING INFORMATION RESPONSE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
provide the configured SRS information to the gNB-CU.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING INFORMATION FAILURE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
indicate that no SRS transmissions could be configured for the UE for uplink
positioning measurement.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING ACTIVATION REQUEST
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to cause
the gNB-DU to activate/trigger UL SRS transmission by the UE.

elementList.name: SRS Spatial Relation
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Spatial Relation Information per SRS Resource IE is present.

elementList.name: Spatial Relation Information per SRS Resource
Activation Time
elementList.description: Indicates the start time when the SRS activation is requested

definitionList.name: POSITIONING ACTIVATION RESPONSE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
confirm successful UL SRS activation in the UE.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING ACTIVATION FAILURE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
indicate that activation of UL SRS transmission in the UE was unsuccessful.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING DEACTIVATION
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to cause
the NG RAN node to deactivate UL SRS transmission or release all the
transmission by the UE.

definitionList.name: E-CID MEASUREMENT INITIATION REQUEST
descriptionList:
This message is sent by gNB-CU to initiate
E-CID measurements.

elementList.name: E-CID Measurement Periodicity
elementList.description: The codepoint “extended” is not applicable.

elementList.name: E-CID Measurement Quantities Item
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Default, NR Angle of Arrival, …, NR Timing Advance)
elementList.description: If “Default” is the only requested measurement quantity, it indicates that the Measured Results List IE need not be included in response or reporting messages.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of E-CID measured quantities that
  can be configured and reported with one message. Value is 64.

conditionList.explanation:
This IE shall be present if the E-CID Report
  Characteristics IE is set to the value "Periodic".

definitionList.name: E-CID MEASUREMENT INITIATION RESPONSE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by gNB-DU to indicate
that the requested E-CID measurement is successfully initiated.

definitionList.name: E-CID MEASUREMENT INITIATION FAILURE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by gNB-DU to indicate
that the requested E-CID measurement cannot be initiated.

definitionList.name: E-CID MEASUREMENT FAILURE INDICATION
descriptionList:
This message is sent by gNB-DU to indicate
that the previously requested E-CID measurement can no longer be reported.

definitionList.name: E-CID MEASUREMENT REPORT
descriptionList:
This message is sent by gNB-DU to report
the results of the requested E-CID measurement.

definitionList.name: E-CID MEASUREMENT TERMINATION COMMAND
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to
terminate the requested E-CID measurement.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING INFORMATION UPDATE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to indicate
that a change in the SRS configuration has occurred.

definitionList.name: PRS CONFIGURATION REQUEST
descriptionList:
This message is sent by a gNB-CU to request
a gNB-DU to configure or update PRS transmissions.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of TRPs in a gNB-DU Value is 65535

conditionList.explanation:
This IE shall be present if the PRS
  Configuration Request Type IE is set to the value "configure".

This IE shall be present if the PRS
  Configuration Request Type IE is set to the value "off".

definitionList.name: PRS CONFIGURATION RESPONSE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by a gNB-DU to acknowledge
configuring or updating the PRS transmissions.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of TRPs in a gNB-DU Value is 65535.

definitionList.name: PRS CONFIGURATION FAILURE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-DU to indicate that it cannot configure any PRS transmission.

definitionList.name: MEASUREMENT PRECONFIGURATION REQUIRED
descriptionList:
This message is sent by a gNB-CU to provide
the PRS configuration information of multiple TRPs to a gNB-DU and request to
configure measurement gap or PRS processing window of the UE.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of TRPs for on-demand PRS in a
  gNB-DU Value is 256

definitionList.name: MEASUREMENT PRECONFIGURATION CONFIRM
descriptionList:
This message is sent by an gNB-DU to gNB-CU
to confirm successful configuration of measurement gap or PRS processing window
of the UE.

definitionList.name: MEASUREMENT PRECONFIGURATION REFUSE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by gNB-DU to indicate
configuration of measurement gap or PRS processing window of the UE was
unsuccessful.

definitionList.name: MEASUREMENT ACTIVATION
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to indicate the gNB-DU to activate the preconfigured measurement gap
for the UE.

elementList.name: MeasPRS Periodicity
elementList.description: Measurement gap periodicity in units of ms

This IE shall be present if the PDC Report

definitionList.name: Message Type
descriptionList:
The Message Type IE uniquely
identifies the message being sent. It is mandatory for all messages.

elementList.name: Type of Message
elementList.type: CHOICE (Initiating Message, Successful Outcome, Unsuccessful Outcome, ...)

definitionList.name: Cause
descriptionList:
The purpose of the Cause IE is to
indicate the reason for a particular event for the F1AP protocol.

elementList.name: Radio Network Layer Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Unspecified, RL failure-RLC, Unknown or already allocated gNB-CU UE F1AP ID, Unknown or already allocated gNB-DU UE F1AP ID, Unknown or inconsistent pair of UE F1AP ID, Interaction with other procedure, Not supported QCI Value, Action Desirable for Radio Reasons, No Radio Resources Available, Procedure cancelled, Normal Release, ..., Cell not available, RL failure-others, UE rejection, Resources not available for the slice(s), AMF initiated abnormal release, Release due to Pre-Emption, PLMN not served by the gNB-CU, Multiple DRB ID Instances, Unknown DRB ID, Multiple BH RLC CH ID Instances, Unknown BH RLC CH ID, CHO-CPC resources to be changed, NPN not supported, NPN access denied, gNB-CU Cell Capacity Exceeded, Report Characteristics Empty, Existing Measurement ID, Measurement Temporarily not Available, Measurement not Supported For The Object, Unknown BAP address, Unknown BAP routing ID, Insufficient UE Capabilities, SCG activation deactivation failure, SCG deactivation failure due to data transmission, Requested Item not Supported on Time, TAT-SDT expiry)

elementList.name: Transport Layer Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Unspecified, Transport Resource Unavailable, ... , Unknown TNL address for IAB, Unknown UP TNL information for IAB)

elementList.name: Protocol Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Transfer Syntax Error, Abstract Syntax Error (Reject), Abstract Syntax Error (Ignore and Notify), Message not Compatible with Receiver State, Semantic Error, Abstract Syntax Error (Falsely Constructed Message), Unspecified, ...)

elementList.name: Miscellaneous Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Control Processing Overload, Not enough User Plane Processing Resources, Hardware Failure, O&M Intervention, Unspecified, ...)

definitionList.name: Criticality Diagnostics
descriptionList:
The Criticality Diagnostics IE is
sent by the gNB-DU or the gNB-CU when parts of a received message have not been
comprehended or were missing, or if the message contained logical errors. When
applicable, it contains information about which IEs were not comprehended or
were missing.

For further details on how to use the Criticality
Diagnostics IE, (see clause 10). The conditions for inclusion of the Transaction
ID IE are described in clause 10.

elementList.name: Procedure Code
elementList.description: Procedure Code is to be used if Criticality Diagnostics is part of Error Indication procedure, and not within the response message of the same procedure that caused the error.

elementList.name: Triggering Message
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(initiating message, successful outcome, unsuccessful outcome)
elementList.description: The Triggering Message is used only if the Criticality Diagnostics is part of Error Indication procedure.

elementList.name: Procedure Criticality
elementList.description: This Procedure Criticality is used for reporting the Criticality of the Triggering message (Procedure).

elementList.name: IE Criticality
elementList.description: The IE Criticality is used for reporting the criticality of the triggering IE. The value 'ignore' is not applicable.

elementList.name: IE ID
elementList.description: The IE ID of the not understood or missing IE.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  of IE errors allowed to be reported with a single message. The value for
  maxnoofErrors is 256.

definitionList.name: gNB-CU UE F1AP ID
descriptionList:
The gNB-CU UE F1AP ID uniquely identifies
the UE association over the F1 interface within the gNB-CU.

NOTE:     If F1-C signalling transport is shared
among multiple interface instances, the value of the gNB-CU UE F1AP ID is
allocated so that it can be associated with the
corresponding F1-C interface instance.

definitionList.name: gNB-DU UE F1AP ID
descriptionList:
The gNB-DU UE F1AP ID uniquely identifies
the UE association over the F1 interface within the gNB-DU.

NOTE:     If F1-C signalling transport is shared
among multiple interface instances, the value of the gNB-DU UE F1AP ID is
allocated so that it can be associated with the corresponding F1-C interface instance.

definitionList.name: RRC-Container
descriptionList:
This
information element contains a gNB-CU→UE or a UE → gNB-CU message that is transferred without interpretation
in the gNB-DU.

definitionList.name: SRB ID
descriptionList: This IE uniquely identifies a SRB for a UE.

elementList.name: SRB ID
elementList.description: Corresponds to the identities of SRB as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. Value 0 indicates SRB0, value 1 indicates SRB1, etc.

definitionList.name: DRB ID
descriptionList: This IE uniquely identifies a DRB for a UE.

elementList.name: DRB ID
elementList.description: Corresponds to the DRB-Identity defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: gNB-DU ID
descriptionList:
The gNB-DU ID uniquely identifies the
gNB-DU at least within a
gNB-CU.

elementList.name: gNB-DU ID
elementList.description: The gNB-DU ID is independently configured from cell identifiers, i.e. no connection between gNB-DU ID and cell identifiers.

definitionList.name: Served Cell Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains cell configuration
information of a cell in the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: NR PCI
elementList.description: Physical Cell ID

elementList.name: 5GS TAC
elementList.description: 5GS Tracking Area Code

elementList.name: Served PLMNs
elementList.description: Broadcast PLMNs in SIB 1 associated to the NR Cell Identity in the NR CGI IE

elementList.name: TAI Slice Support List
elementList.description: Supported S-NSSAIs per PLMN or per SNPN.

elementList.name: NPN Support Information
elementList.description: Supported NPNs per PLMN.

elementList.name: Extended TAI Slice Support List
elementList.description: Additional Supported S-NSSAIs per PLMN or per SNPN.

elementList.name: UL FreqInfo
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Cell Direction IE is included and set to “dl-only”.

elementList.name: DL FreqInfo
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Cell Direction IE is included and set to “ul-only”.

elementList.name: UL Transmission Bandwidth
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Cell Direction IE is included and set to “dl-only”.

elementList.name: DL Transmission Bandwidth
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Cell Direction IE is included and set to “ul-only”.

elementList.name: UL Carrier List
elementList.description: If included, the UL Transmission Bandwidth IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: DL Carrier List
elementList.description: If included, the DL Transmission Bandwidth IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: TDD UL-DL Configuration Common NR
elementList.description: The tdd-UL-DL-ConfigurationCommon as defined in TS 38.331 [8]

elementList.name: Carrier List
elementList.description: If included, the Transmission Bandwidth IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: NR-U Channel ID
elementList.description: Index to uniquely identify the part of the NR-U Channel Bandwidth consisting of a contiguous set of resource blocks (RBs) on which a channel access procedure is performed in shared spectrum. Value 1 represents the first part of the NR-U Channel Bandwidth on which a channel access procedure is performed. Value 2 represents the second part of the NR-U Channel Bandwidth on which a channel access procedure is performed, and so on.

elementList.name: NR-U ARFCN
elementList.description: It represents the centre frequency of the NR-U Channel Bandwidth. Only values specified in TS 38.101-1 [26] for NR shared spectrum are valid.

elementList.name: Measurement Timing Configuration
elementList.description: Contains the MeasurementTimingConfiguration inter-node message defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Extended Served PLMNs List
elementList.description: This is included if more than 6 Served PLMNs is to be signalled.

elementList.name: TAI Slice Support List
elementList.description: Supported S-NSSAIs per PLMN or per SNPN.

elementList.name: NPN Support Information
elementList.description: Supported NPNs per PLMN.

elementList.name: Extended TAI Slice Support List
elementList.description: Additional Supported S-NSSAIs per PLMN or per SNPN.

elementList.name: Broadcast PLMN Identity Info List
elementList.description: This IE corresponds to the PLMN-IdentityInfoList IE and the NPN-IdentityInfoList IE (if available) in SIB1 as specified in TS 38.331 [8]. All PLMN Identities and associated information contained in the PLMN-IdentityInfoList IE and NPN identities and associated information contained in the NPN-IdentityInfoList IE (if available) are included and provided in the same order as broadcast in SIB1. NOTE: In case of NPN-only cell, the PLMN Identities and associated information contained in the PLMN-IdentityInfoList IE are not included.

elementList.name: PLMN Identity List
elementList.description: Broadcast PLMN IDs in SIB1 associated to the NR Cell Identity IE

elementList.name: Configured TAC Indication
elementList.description: NOTE: This IE is associated with the 5GS TAC in the Broadcast PLMN Identity Info List IE

elementList.name: NPN Broadcast Information
elementList.description: If this IE is included the content of the PLMN Identity List IE and Extended PLMN Identity List IE if present in the Broadcast PLMN Identity Info List IE is ignored.

elementList.name: Configured TAC Indication
elementList.description: NOTE: This IE is associated with the 5GS TAC on top-level of the Served Cell Information IE

elementList.name: Aggressor gNB Set ID
elementList.description: This IE indicates the associated aggressor gNB Set ID of the cell

elementList.name: Victim gNB Set ID
elementList.description: This IE indicates the associated Victim gNB Set ID of the cell

elementList.name: Supported MBS FSA ID List
elementList.description: Shall contain all MBS Frequency Selection Area Identities associated with the NR CGI.

elementList.name: RedCap Broadcast Information
elementList.description: The presence of this IE indicates that the intraFreqReselectionRedCap IE is broadcast in SIB1 of the corresponding cell, see TS 38.331 [8]. Each position in the bitmap indicates which RedCap UEs are allowed access, according to the setting of RedCap barring indicators in SIB1, see TS 38.331 [8]. First bit = 1Rx, second bit = 2Rx, other bits reserved for future use. Value '1' indicates 'access allowed'. Value '0' indicates 'access not allowed”.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of Broadcast PLMN Ids. Value is 6.

Maximum no. of Extended Broadcast PLMN Ids.
  Value is 6.

Maximum no. of PLMN Ids.broadcast in an NR
  cell. Value is 12.

Maximum no. NR-U Channel IDs in a cell. Value
  is 4.
Maximum no. of MBS FSAs by a cell. Value is 256.

definitionList.name: Transmission Action Indicator
descriptionList:
This IE indicates actions
for the gNB-DU for the data transmission to the UE.

definitionList.name: NR CGI
descriptionList:
The NR
Cell Global Identifier (NR CGI) is used to globally identify a cell.

definitionList.name: Time To wait
descriptionList:
This IE
defines the minimum allowed waiting times.

definitionList.name: PLMN Identity
descriptionList:
This
information element indicates the PLMN Identity.

elementList.name: PLMN Identity
elementList.description: - digits 0 to 9, encoded 0000 to 1001, - 1111 used as filler digit, two digits per octet, - bits 4 to 1 of octet n encoding digit 2n-1 - bits 8 to 5 of octet n encoding digit 2n -The PLMN identity consists of 3 digits from MCC followed by either -a filler digit plus 2 digits from MNC (in case of 2 digit MNC) or -3 digits from MNC (in case of a 3 digit MNC).

definitionList.name: Transmission Bandwidth
descriptionList:
The Transmission
Bandwidth IE is used to indicate the UL or DL transmission bandwidth.

elementList.name: NR SCS
elementList.description: The values scs15, scs30, scs60 and scs120 corresponds to the sub carrier spacing in TS 38.104 [17].

elementList.name: NRB
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (nrb11, nrb18, nrb24, nrb25, nrb31, nrb32, nrb38, nrb51, nrb52, nrb65, nrb66, nrb78, nrb79, nrb93, nrb106, nrb107, nrb121, nrb132, nrb133, nrb135, nrb160, nrb162, nrb189, nrb216, nrb217, nrb245, nrb264, nrb270, nrb273, ...)
elementList.description: This IE is used to indicate the UL or DL transmission bandwidth expressed in units of resource blocks "NRB" (TS 38.104 [17]). The values nrb11, nrb18, etc. correspond to the number of resource blocks "NRB" 11, 18, etc.

definitionList.name: NR Frequency Info
descriptionList:
The NR Frequency Info defines the carrier
frequency used in a cell for a given direction (UL or DL) in FDD or for both UL
and DL directions in TDD or for an SUL carrier.

elementList.name: NR ARFCN
elementList.description: RF Reference Frequency as defined in TS 38.104 [17] section 5.4.2.1. The frequency provided in this IE identifies the absolute frequency position of the reference resource block (Common RB 0) of the carrier. Its lowest subcarrier is also known as Point A.

elementList.name: NR Frequency Band
elementList.description: Operating Band as defined in TS 38.104 [17] section 5.4.2.3. The value 1 corresponds to NR operating band n1, value 2 corresponds to NR operating band n2, etc.

elementList.name: Supported SUL band Item
elementList.description: Supplementary NR Operating Band as defined in TS 38.104 [17] section 5.4.2.3 that can be used for SUL duplex mode as per TS 38.101-1 [26] table 5.2.-1. The value 80 corresponds to NR operating band n80, value 81 corresponds to NR operating band n81, etc.

elementList.name: Frequency Shift 7p5khz
elementList.description: Indicate whether the value of Δshift is 0kHz or 7.5kHz when calculating FREF,shift as defined in Section 5.4.2.1 of TS 38.104 [17].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum value of NR ARFCNs. Value is 3279165.

Maximum no. of frequency bands supported for a
  NR cell. Value is 32.

definitionList.name: gNB-DU System Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains the system information
generated by the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: MIB message
elementList.description: MIB message, as defined in subclause 6.2.2 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SIB1 message
elementList.description: SIB1 message, as defined in subclause 6.2.2 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SIB12 message
elementList.description: SIB12, as defined in subclause 6.3.1 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SIB13 message
elementList.description: SIB13, as defined in subclause 6.3.1 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SIB14 message
elementList.description: SIB14, as defined in subclause 6.3.1 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SIB10 message
elementList.description: SIB10, as defined in subclause 6.3.1 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SIB17 message
elementList.description: SIB17, as defined in subclause 6.3.1 in TS 38.331 [8]

definitionList.name: E-UTRAN QoS
descriptionList:
This IE defines the QoS to be applied to a
DRB or to a BH RLC channel for
EN-DC case.

elementList.name: QCI
elementList.description: QoS Class Identifier defined in TS 23.401 [10]. Logical range and coding specified in TS 23.203 [11]. For a BH RLC channel, the Packet Delay Budget included in QCI defines the upper bound for the time that a packet may be delayed between the gNB-DU and its child IAB-MT.

elementList.name: GBR QoS Information
elementList.description: This IE shall be present for GBR bearers only and is ignored otherwise.

elementList.name: ENB DL Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: DL Transport Layer Address of node terminating PDCP. Included for MN-terminated SCG bearers.

definitionList.name: Allocation and Retention Priority
descriptionList:
This IE specifies the relative importance
compared to other E-RABs for allocation and retention of the E-UTRAN Radio Access
Bearer.

elementList.name: Priority Level
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE should be understood as "priority of allocation and retention" (see TS 23.401 [10]). Usage: Value 15 means "no priority". Values between 1 and 14 are ordered in decreasing order of priority, i.e. 1 is the highest and 14 the lowest. Value 0 shall be treated as a logical error if received.

elementList.name: Pre-emption Capability
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(shall not trigger pre-emption, may trigger pre-emption)
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE indicates the pre-emption capability of the request on other E-RABs (see TS 23.401 [10]). Usage: The E-RAB shall not pre-empt other E-RABs or, the E-RAB may pre-empt other E-RABs The Pre-emption Capability indicator applies to the allocation of resources for an E-RAB and as such it provides the trigger to the pre-emption procedures/processes of the eNB.

elementList.name: Pre-emption Vulnerability
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE indicates the vulnerability of the E-RAB to pre-emption of other E-RABs (see TS 23.401 [10]). Usage: The E-RAB shall not be pre-empted by other E-RABs or the E-RAB may be pre-empted by other RABs. Pre-emption Vulnerability indicator applies for the entire duration of the E-RAB, unless modified, and as such indicates whether the E-RAB is a target of the pre-emption procedures/processes of the eNB.

definitionList.name: GBR QoS Information
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the maximum and
guaranteed bit rates of a GBR E-RAB for downlink and uplink.

elementList.name: E-RAB Maximum Bit Rate Downlink
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate in DL (i.e. from EPC to E-UTRAN) for the bearer. Details in TS 23.401 [10].

elementList.name: E-RAB Maximum Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate in UL (i.e. from E-UTRAN to EPC) for the bearer. Details in TS 23.401 [10].

elementList.name: E-RAB Guaranteed Bit Rate Downlink
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate (provided that there is data to deliver) in DL (i.e. from EPC to E-UTRAN) for the bearer. Details in TS 23.401 [10].

elementList.name: E-RAB Guaranteed Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate (provided that there is data to deliver) in UL (i.e. from E-UTRAN to EPC) for the bearer. Details in TS 23.401 [10].

definitionList.name: Bit Rate
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the number of bits
delivered by NG-RAN in UL or to NG-RAN in DL within a period of time, divided
by the duration of the period. It is used, for example, to indicate the maximum
or guaranteed bit rate for a GBR QoS flow, or an aggregated maximum bit rate.

elementList.name: Bit Rate
elementList.description: The unit is: bit/s

definitionList.name: Transaction ID
descriptionList:
The Transaction ID IE uniquely
identifies a procedure among all ongoing parallel procedures of the same type
initiated by the same protocol peer. Messages belonging to the same procedure use
the same Transaction ID. The Transaction ID is determined by the initiating
peer of a procedure.

NOTE:      If F1-C signalling transport is shared
among multiple interface instances, the Transaction ID is allocated so that it
can be associated with an F1-C interface instance. The Transaction ID may identify more than one interface instance.

definitionList.name: DRX Cycle
descriptionList: The DRX Cycle IE is to indicate the desired DRX cycle.

elementList.name: Long DRX Cycle Length
elementList.description: This IE is defined in TS 38.331 [8]

elementList.name: Short DRX Cycle Length
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (ms2, ms3, ms4, ms5, ms6, ms7, ms8, ms10, ms14, ms16, ms20, ms30, ms32, ms35, ms40, ms64, ms80, ms128, ms160, ms256, ms320, ms512, ms640, ...)
elementList.description: This IE is defined in TS 38.331 [8]

elementList.name: Short DRX Cycle Timer
elementList.description: This IE is defined in TS 38.331 [8]

definitionList.name: CU to DU RRC Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains the RRC Information that
are sent from gNB-CU to gNB-DU.

elementList.name: CG-ConfigInfo
elementList.description: CG-ConfigInfo, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: UE-CapabilityRAT-ContainerList
elementList.description: This IE is used in the NG-RAN and it consists of the UE-CapabilityRAT-ContainerList, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: MeasConfig
elementList.description: MeasConfig, as defined in TS 38.331 [8] (without MeasGapConfig). For EN-DC/NGEN-DC operation, includes the list of FR2 frequencies for which the gNB-CU requests the gNB-DU to generate gaps. For NG-RAN,NE-DC and MN for NR-NR DC, includes the list of FR1 and/or FR2 frequencies for which the gNB-CU requests the gNB-DU to generate gaps and the gap type (per-UE or per-FR).

elementList.name: Handover Preparation Information
elementList.description: HandoverPreparationInformation, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: CellGroupConfig
elementList.description: CellGroupConfig, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Measurement Timing Configuration
elementList.description: Contains the MeasurementTimingConfiguration inter-node message defined in TS 38.331 [8]. In EN-DC/NGEN-DC, it is included when the gaps for FR2 are requested to be configured by the MeNB. For MN in NR-NR DC,it is included when the gaps for FR2 and/or FR1 are requested by the SgNB

elementList.name: UEAssistanceInformation
elementList.description: UEAssistanceInformation, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: CG-Config
elementList.description: CG-Config, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: UEAssistanceInformationEUTRA
elementList.description: UEAssistanceInformation, as defined in TS 36.331 [41].

elementList.name: Location Measurement Information
elementList.description: LocationMeasurementInfo, as defined in TS 38.331[8]

elementList.name: MUSIM-GapConfig
elementList.description: MUSIM-GapConfig as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: DU to CU RRC Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains the RRC Information that
are sent from the gNB-DU to the gNB-CU.

elementList.name: CellGroupConfig
elementList.description: CellGroupConfig, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: MeasGapConfig
elementList.description: MeasGapConfig as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. For EN-DC/NGEN-DC operation, includes the gap for FR2, as requested by the gNB-CU via MeasConfig IE. For NG-RAN,NE-DC and MN for NR-NR DC, includes the gap(s) for FR1 and/or FR2, as requested by the gNB-CU via MeasConfig IE and according to the requested gap type (per-UE or per-FR).

elementList.name: Requested P-MaxFR1
elementList.description: requestedP-MaxFR1, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. For EN-DC, NGEN-DC and NR-DC operation, this IE should be included.

elementList.name: DRX Long Cycle Start Offset
elementList.description: Identical to the value of the drx-LongCycleStartOffset IE within the DRX-Config as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. This field is not used in NR-DC.

elementList.name: Selected BandCombinationIndex
elementList.description: BandCombinationIndex, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. For (NG)EN-DC and NR DC operation, this IE should be included so that gNB-CU is informed of the selected Band Combination; if this IE is included, the gNB-CU uses this information to deduce the selected band.

elementList.name: Selected FeatureSetEntryIndex
elementList.description: FeatureSetEntryIndex, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. For (NG)EN-DC and NR DC operation, this IE should be included so that gNB-CU is informed of the selected FeatureSet.

elementList.name: Ph-InfoSCG
elementList.description: PH-TypeListSCG, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].For MR-DC, this IE should be included so that gNB-CU is informed of the Power Headroom type for each serving cell in SN.

elementList.name: Requested BandCombinationIndex
elementList.description: BandCombinationIndex, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. This IE is used for the gNB-DU to request a new Band Combination.

elementList.name: Requested FeatureSetEntryIndex
elementList.description: FeatureSetEntryIndex, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. This IE is used for the gNB-DU to request a new Feature Set.

elementList.name: DRX Config
elementList.description: DRX-Config, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. This field is only used in NR-DC.

elementList.name: PDCCH BlindDetectionSCG
elementList.description: pdcch-BlindDetectionSCG, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. This IE is used between the MgNB-DU and the MgNB-CU.

elementList.name: Requested PDCCH BlindDetectionSCG
elementList.description: requestedPDCCH-BlindDetectionSCG, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. This IE is used between the SgNB-DU and the SgNB-CU.

elementList.name: Ph-InfoMCG
elementList.description: PH-TypeListMCG, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. For MR-DC, this IE should be included so that gNB-CU is informed of the Power Headroom type for each serving cell in MCG.

elementList.name: MeasGapSharingConfig
elementList.description: MeasGapSharingConfig as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SL-PHY-MAC-RLC-Config
elementList.description: SL-PHY-MAC-RLC-Config as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SL-ConfigDedicatedEUTRA-Info
elementList.description: SL-ConfigDedicatedEUTRA-Info as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Requested P-MaxFR2
elementList.description: RequestedP-MaxFR2, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. For NR-DC operation, this IE should be included.

elementList.name: SDT-MACPHY-Config
elementList.description: SDT-MACPHY-Config, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: MUSIM-GapConfig
elementList.description: MUSIM-GapConfig as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: RLC Mode
descriptionList:
The RLC Mode IE indicates the RLC
Mode used for a DRB or a BH RLC channel, or a Uu RLC channel, or a PC5 RLC channel.

definitionList.name: SUL Information
descriptionList: This IE provides information about the SUL carrier.

elementList.name: SUL ARFCN
elementList.description: RF Reference Frequency as defined in TS 38.104 [17] section 5.4.2.1. The frequency provided in this IE identifies the absolute frequency position of the reference resource block (Common RB 0) of the SUL carrier. Its lowest subcarrier is also known as Point A.

elementList.name: Carrier List
elementList.description: If included, the SUL Transmission Bandwidth IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: Frequency Shift 7p5khz
elementList.description: Indicate whether the value of Δshift is 0kHz or 7.5kHz when calculating FREF,shift as defined in Section 5.4.2.1 of TS 38.104 [17].

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum
  value of NR ARFCNs. Value is 3279165.

definitionList.name: 5GS TAC
descriptionList:
This
information element is used to identify Tracking Area Code.

definitionList.name: Configured EPS TAC
descriptionList:
This information element is used to
identify a configured EPS Tracking Area Code in order to enable application of
Roaming and Access Restrictions for EN-DC as specified in TS 37.340 [7]. This
IE is configured for the cell, but not broadcast.

definitionList.name: RRC Reconfiguration Complete Indicator
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the
result of the reconfiguration performed towards the UE.

definitionList.name: UL Configuration
descriptionList: This IE indicates how the UL scheduling is configured at gNB-DU.

elementList.name: UL UE Configuration
elementList.description: Indicates how the UE uses the UL at gNB-DU, for which "no-data" indicates that the UL scheduling is not performed at gNB-DU, "shared" indicates that the UL scheduling is performed at both gNB-DU and another node, and "only" indicates that the UL scheduling is only performed at the gNB-DU.

definitionList.name: C-RNTI
descriptionList: This IE contains the C-RNTI information.

elementList.name: C-RNTI
elementList.description: C-RNTI as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: Cell UL Configured
descriptionList:
This IE indicates whether
the gNB-CU requests the gNB-DU to configure the uplink as no UL, UL, SUL or
UL+SUL for the indicated cell for the UE.

elementList.name: Cell UL Configured
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (none, UL, SUL, UL and SUL, ...)
elementList.description: Further details are defined in TS 38.331 [8]

definitionList.name: RAT-Frequency Priority Information
descriptionList:
The RAT-Frequency Priority Information
contains either the Subscriber Profile ID for RAT/Frequency priority IE
or the Index to RAT/Frequency Selection Priority IE. These parameters
are used to define local configuration for RRM strategies.

elementList.name: Subscriber Profile ID for RAT/Frequency priority

definitionList.name: LCID
descriptionList:
This IE uniquely identifies a LCID for the
associated SRB or DRB.

elementList.name: LCID
elementList.description: Corresponds to the LogicalChannelIdentity defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: Duplication activation
descriptionList:
The Duplication Activation IE
indicates whether UL PDCP Duplication is activated or not.

definitionList.name: Slice Support List
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the list of supported
slices.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of signalled slice support items.
  Value is 1024.

definitionList.name: S-NSSAI
descriptionList: This IE indicates the S-NSSAI as defined in TS 23.003 [23].

definitionList.name: UE Identity Index value
descriptionList: This IE is used by the gNB-DU to calculate the Paging Frame.

elementList.name: Index Length 10
elementList.description: Coded as specified in TS 38.304 [24].

definitionList.name: Paging DRX
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the
Paging DRX as defined in TS 38.304 [24].

elementList.name: Paging DRX
elementList.description: Unit in radio frame.

definitionList.name: Paging Priority
descriptionList:
This IE indicates
the paging priority for paging a UE.

elementList.name: Paging Priority
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (PrioLevel1, PrioLevel2, PrioLevel3, PrioLevel4, PrioLevel5, PrioLevel6, PrioLevel7, PrioLevel8, ...)
elementList.description: Lower value codepoint indicates higher priority.

definitionList.name: gNB-CU System Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains the system information
encoded by the gNB-CU.

elementList.name: SIB type to Be Updated List
SIB type to Be Updated Item IEs
SIB type
elementList.description: Indicates a certain SIB block, e.g. 2 means sibType2, 3 for sibType3, etc. Values 6, 7, 8 and values 10 and higher are not applicable in this version of the specifications.

elementList.name: SIB message
elementList.description: SIB as defined in subclause 6.3.1 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: areaScope
elementList.description: Indicates that a SIB is area specific. If the field is not present, the SIB is cell specific.

elementList.name: SystemInformationAreaID
elementList.description: Indicates the system information area that the cell belongs to, if any.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of SIB types, the maximum value is
  32.

definitionList.name: RAN UE Paging identity
descriptionList: This IE indicates the RAN UE Paging identity.

definitionList.name: CN UE Paging Identity
descriptionList:
The 5G-S-TMSI is used as UE identifier for
CN paging.

elementList.name: 5G-S-TMSI
elementList.description: Details defined in TS 38.413 [3]

definitionList.name: QoS Flow Level QoS Parameters
descriptionList:
This IE defines the QoS to be applied to a
QoS flow, or to a DRB, or to a BH RLC channel, or to a Uu RLC channel, or to a PC5 RLC
channel.

NOTE:      For a BH RLC channel, the listed
mandatory IEs and the GBR
QoS Flow Information IE are applicable, where GBR
QoS Flow Information IE may be present if BH RLC channel conveys the
traffic belonging to a GBR QoS
Flow.

elementList.name: GBR QoS Flow Information
elementList.description: This IE shall be present for GBR QoS Flows only and is ignored otherwise.

elementList.name: Reflective QoS Attribute
elementList.description: Details in TS 23.501 [21]. This IE applies to non-GBR flows only and is ignored otherwise.

elementList.name: PDU Session ID
elementList.description: As specified in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: UL PDU Session Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate
elementList.description: The PDU session Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate Uplink which is associated with the involved PDU session.

elementList.name: QoS Monitoring Request
elementList.description: Indicates to measure UL, or DL, or both UL/DL delays for the associated QoS flow or stop the corresponding QoS monitoring.

elementList.name: PDCP Terminating Node DL Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: DL Transport Layer Address of node terminating PDCP. Included for MN-terminated SCG bearers and SN-terminated MCG bearers.

definitionList.name: GBR QoS Flow Information
descriptionList:
This IE indicates QoS parameters for a GBR
QoS flow or GBR bearer for downlink and uplink.

elementList.name: Maximum Flow Bit Rate Downlink
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate in DL. Details in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Maximum Flow Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate in UL. Details in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Guaranteed Flow Bit Rate Downlink
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate (provided there is data to deliver) in DL. Details in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Guaranteed Flow Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate (provided there is data to deliver). Details in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Maximum Packet Loss Rate Downlink
elementList.description: Indicates the maximum rate for lost packets that can be tolerated in the downlink direction. Details in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Maximum Packet Loss Rate Uplink
elementList.description: Indicates the maximum rate for lost packets that can be tolerated in the uplink direction. Details in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Alternative QoS Parameters Set List
elementList.description: Indicates alternative sets of QoS Parameters for the QoS flow.

definitionList.name: Dynamic 5QI Descriptor
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the QoS Characteristics
for a Non-standardised or not pre-configured 5QI for downlink and uplink.

elementList.name: QoS Priority Level
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Packet Delay Budget
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. For IAB, the Packet Delay Budget defines the upper bound for the time that a packet may be delayed between the IAB-DU/IAB-donor-DU and its child IAB-MT, or between the IAB-DU and its served UE. For a PC5 RLC channel, the Packet Delay Budget defines the upper bound for the time that a packet may be delayed between the L2 U2N relay UE and L2 U2N remote UE. For a Uu RLC channel, the Packet Delay Budget defines the upper bound for the time that a packet may be delayed between the gNB-DU and L2 U2N relay UE. This IE is ignored if the Extended Packet Delay Budget IE is present.

elementList.name: Packet Error Rate
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: 5QI
elementList.description: This IE contains the dynamically assigned 5QI as specified in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Delay Critical
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Averaging Window
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. This IE shall be included if the Delay Critical IE is set to "delay critical" and is ignored otherwise.

elementList.name: Extended Packet Delay Budget
elementList.description: Packet Delay Budget is specified in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: CN Packet Delay Budget Downlink
elementList.description: Core Network Packet Delay Budget is specified in TS 23.501 [21]. This IE may be present in case of GBR QoS flows and is ignored otherwise.

elementList.name: CN Packet Delay Budget Uplink
elementList.description: Core Network Packet Delay Budget is specified in TS 23.501 [21]. This IE may be present in case of GBR QoS flows and is ignored otherwise.

conditionList.explanation:
This IE shall be present if the GBR QoS Flow Information IE is
  present in the QoS Flow Level QoS Parameters IE.

definitionList.name: NG-RAN Allocation and Retention Priority
descriptionList:
This IE specifies the relative importance
of a QoS flow or a DRB compared to other QoS flows or DRBs for allocation and
retention of NG-RAN resources.

elementList.name: Priority Level
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE defines the relative importance of a resource request (see TS 23.501 [21]). Usage: Values are ordered in decreasing order of priority, i.e., with 1 as the highest priority and 15 as the lowest priority. Further usage is defined in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Pre-emption Capability
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (shall not trigger pre-emption, may trigger pre-emption)
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE indicates the pre-emption capability of the request on other QoS flows (see TS 23.501 [21]). Usage: The QoS flow shall not pre-empt other QoS flows or, the QoS flow may pre-empt other QoS flows. Note: The Pre-emption Capability indicator applies to the allocation of resources for a QoS flow and as such it provides the trigger to the pre-emption procedures/processes of the gNB.

elementList.name: Pre-emption Vulnerability
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE indicates the vulnerability of the QoS flow to pre-emption of other QoS flows (see TS 23.501 [21]). Usage: The QoS flow shall not be pre-empted by other QoS flows or the QoS flow may be pre-empted by other QoS flows. Note: The Pre-emption Vulnerability indicator applies for the entire duration of the QoS flow, unless modified and as such indicates whether the QoS flow is a target of the pre-emption procedures/processes of thegNB.

definitionList.name: Non Dynamic 5QI Descriptor
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the QoS Characteristics
for a standardized or pre-configured 5QI for downlink and uplink.

elementList.name: 5QI
elementList.description: This IE contains the standardized or pre-configured 5QI as specified in TS 23.501 [21]. For a BH RLC channel, the Packet Delay Budget included in 5QI defines the upper bound for the time that a packet may be delayed between the gNB-DU and its child IAB-MT.

elementList.name: Priority Level
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. When included overrides standardized or pre-configured value.

elementList.name: Averaging Window
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. When included overrides standardized or pre-configured value.

elementList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. When included overrides standardized or pre-configured value.

elementList.name: CN Packet Delay Budget Downlink
elementList.description: Core Network Packet Delay Budget is specified in TS 23.501 [21]. This IE may be present in case of GBR QoS flows and is ignored otherwise.

elementList.name: CN Packet Delay Budget Uplink
elementList.description: Core Network Packet Delay Budget is specified in TS 23.501 [21]. This IE may be present in case of GBR QoS flows and is ignored otherwise.

definitionList.name: Maximum Packet Loss Rate
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Maximum Packet Loss
Rate.

elementList.name: Maximum Packet Loss Rate
elementList.description: Ratio of lost packets per number of packets sent, expressed in tenth of percent.

definitionList.name: Packet Delay Budget
descriptionList: This IE indicates the Packet Delay Budget for a QoS flow.

elementList.name: Packet Delay Budget
elementList.description: Upper bound value for the delay that a packet may experience expressed in unit of 0.5ms.

definitionList.name: Packet Error Rate
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Packet Error Rate for
a QoS flow.

elementList.name: Scalar
elementList.description: The packet error rate is expressed as Scalar x 10-k where k is the Exponent.

definitionList.name: Averaging Window
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Averaging Window for
a QoS flow, and applies to GBR QoS Flows only.

elementList.name: Averaging Window
elementList.description: Unit: ms. The default value is 2000ms.

definitionList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Maximum Data Burst
Volume for a QoS flow, and applies to delay critical
GBR QoS flows only.

elementList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
elementList.description: Unit: byte.

definitionList.name: Masked IMEISV
descriptionList:
This information element contains the IMEISV value with a mask, to identify a
terminal model without identifying an individual Mobile
Equipment.

elementList.name: Masked IMEISV
elementList.description: Coded as the International Mobile station Equipment Identity and Software Version Number (IMEISV) defined in TS 23.003 [23] with the last 4 digits of the SNR masked by setting the corresponding bits to 1. The first to fourth bits correspond to the first digit of the IMEISV, the fifth to eighth bits correspond to the second digit of the IMEISV, and so on.

definitionList.name: Notification Control
descriptionList:
The Notification Control IE
indicates whether the notification control for a given DRB is active or
not-active.

definitionList.name: RAN Area Code
descriptionList:
This information element is used to
uniquely identify a RAN Area Code.

elementList.name: RANAC
elementList.description: RAN Area Code

definitionList.name: PWS System Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains the system information
used for public warning.

elementList.name: SIB type
elementList.description: Indicates a certain SIB block for public warning message, e.g. 6 means sibType6, 7 for sibType7, etc.

elementList.name: SIB message
elementList.description: SIB message for public warning, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Additional SIB Message List
elementList.description: Additional SIB messages containing different segments of a public warning message if segmentation is applied, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: Repetition Period
descriptionList:
This IE
indicates the periodicity of the warning message to be broadcast.

elementList.name: Repetition Period
elementList.description: The unit of value 1 to 217-1 is [second].

definitionList.name: Number of Broadcasts Requested
descriptionList:
This IE indicates
the number of times a message is to be broadcast.

definitionList.name: SIType List
descriptionList:
This IE is used by gNB-CU to provide SI
list of other SI for gNB-DU.

elementList.name: SI Type
elementList.description: Indicates a certain SI type required to be broadcasted by the gNB-DU. The SI Type value of other SI starts from 2

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of SI types, the maximum
  value is 32.

definitionList.name: QoS Flow Identifier
descriptionList:
This IE identifies a QoS Flow within a PDU
Session. The definition and use of the QoS Flow Identifieris specified in TS
23.501 [21].

definitionList.name: Served E-UTRA Cell Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains served cell information of
an E-UTRA cell for spectrum sharing between E-UTRA and NR.

elementList.name: UL Offset to Point A
