elementList.description: Indicates the offset to the center of the NR carrier for UL.

elementList.name: DL Offset to Point A
elementList.description: Indicates the offset to the center of the NR carrier for DL.

elementList.name: Offset to Point A
elementList.description: Indicates the offset to the center of the NR carrier.

elementList.name: Protected E-UTRA Resource Indication
elementList.description: Indicates the Protected E-UTRA Resource Indication as defined in subclause 9.2.125 of TS 36.423 [9].

definitionList.name: Available PLMN List
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the list of available
PLMN.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of Broadcast PLMN Ids.
  Value is 6.

definitionList.name: RLC Failure Indication
descriptionList:
This IE indicates
the LCID associated with the RLC entity needing re-establishment.

definitionList.name: Uplink TxDirectCurrentList Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the Uplink TxDirectCurrentList information that is configured by the UE.

elementList.name: Uplink TxDirectCurrentList Information
elementList.description: UplinkTxDirectCurrentList as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: Service Status
descriptionList:
This IE is used to indicate the service
status of a cell by the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: Service State
elementList.description: Indicates the Service State of the cell. In-Service and Out-of-Service Service States are defined in TS 38.401 [4].

elementList.name: Switching Off Ongoing
elementList.description: This IE indicates that the gNB-DU will delete the cell after some time using a new gNB-DU Configuration Update procedure.

definitionList.name: RLC Status
descriptionList:
This IE indicates about the RLC
configuration change included in the container towards the UE.

elementList.name: Reestablishment Indication
elementList.description: Indicates that following a change in the radio status, the RLC has been re-established.

definitionList.name: RRC Version
descriptionList:
This information element is used to
identify RRC version corresponding to TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Latest RRC Version
elementList.description: This IE is not used in this release.

elementList.name: Latest RRC Version Enhanced
elementList.description: Latest supported RRC version in the release corresponding to TS 38.331 [8]. For a 3GPP specification version x.y.z, x is encoded by the leftmost byte, y by the middle byte, and z by the rightmost byte. If the RRC protocol is not supported in the gNB-DU, this IE is set to all ‘0’s.

definitionList.name: RRC Delivery Status
descriptionList:
This IE provides information about the
delivery status of RRC messages to the UE.

elementList.name: Delivery Status
elementList.description: Highest NR PDCP SN successfully delivered in sequence to the UE.

elementList.name: Triggering Message
elementList.description: NR PDCP SN for the RRC message that triggered the report.

definitionList.name: QoS Flow Mapping Indication
descriptionList:
This IE is used to indicate only the uplink
or downlink QoS flow is mapped to the DRB.

elementList.name: QoS Flow Mapping Indication
elementList.description: Indicates that only the uplink or downlink QoS flow is mapped to the DRB

definitionList.name: Resource Coordination Transfer Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains information for
UE-associated E-UTRA – NR resource coordination.

elementList.name: MeNB Cell ID
elementList.description: E-UTRAN Cell Identifier IE contained in the ECGI as defined in TS 36.423 [9] clause 9.2.14

definitionList.name: E-UTRA PRACH Configuration
descriptionList: This IE indicates the PRACH resources used in E-UTRA cell.

elementList.name: RootSequenceIndex
elementList.description: See section 5.7.2. in TS 36.211 [27]

elementList.name: ZeroCorrelationZoneConfiguration
elementList.description: See section 5.7.2. in TS 36.211 [27]

elementList.name: HighSpeedFlag
elementList.description: TRUE corresponds to Restricted set and FALSE to Unrestricted set. See section 5.7.2 in TS 36.211 [27]

elementList.name: PRACH-FrequencyOffset
elementList.description: See section 5.7.1 of TS 36.211 [27]

elementList.name: PRACH-ConfigurationIndex
elementList.description: See section 5.7.1. in TS 36.211 [27]

conditionList.explanation:
This IE
  shall be present if the EUTRA-Mode-Info IE in the Resource
  Coordination E-UTRA Cell Information IE is set to the value
  "TDD".

definitionList.name: Resource Coordination E-UTRA Cell Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains E-UTRA cell information
for UE-associated E-UTRA – NR resource coordination.

elementList.name: UL EARFCN
elementList.description: The relation between EARFCN and carrier frequency (in MHz) is defined in TS 36.104 [25].

elementList.name: DL EARFCN
elementList.description: The relation between EARFCN and carrier frequency (in MHz) is defined in TS 36.104 [25].

elementList.name: UL Transmission Bandwidth
elementList.description: Present if UL EARFCN IE is present.

elementList.name: EARFCN
elementList.description: The relation between EARFCN and carrier frequency (in MHz) is defined in TS 36.104 [25].

elementList.name: Subframe Assignment
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(sa0, sa1, sa2, sa3, sa4, sa5, sa6,…)
elementList.description: Uplink-downlink subframe configuration information defined in TS 36.211 [27]. In NB-IOT, sa0 and sa6 are not applicable.

elementList.name: Special Subframe Info
elementList.description: Special subframe configuration information defined in TS 36.211 [27]

elementList.name: Special Subframe Patterns
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(ssp0, ssp1, ssp2, ssp3, ssp4, ssp5, ssp6, ssp7, ssp8, ssp9, ssp10, …)

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum value of extended EARFCN. Value is
  262143.

definitionList.name: Extended Available PLMN List
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the list of available
PLMN.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of Extended Broadcast PLMN Ids.
  Value is 6.

definitionList.name: Associated SCell List
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the list of SCells
associated with the RLC entity indicated by the RLC Failure Indication
IE.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of SCells allowed towards one UE,
  the maximum value is 32.

definitionList.name: Cell Direction
descriptionList:
This IE indicates if the cell is either bidirectional
or only DL or only UL.

definitionList.name: Paging Origin
descriptionList:
This IE indicates whether Paging is
originated due to the PDU sessions from the non-3GPP access.

definitionList.name: E-UTRA Transmission Bandwidth
descriptionList:
This IE is used to indicate the E-UTRA UL
or DL transmission bandwidth expressed in units of resource blocks " NRB
" (TS 36.104 [25]). The values bw1, bw6, bw15, bw25, bw50, bw75, bw100
correspond to the number of resource blocks "NRB" 6, 15,
25, 50, 75, 100.

elementList.name: E-UTRA Transmission Bandwidth
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (bw6, bw15, bw25, bw50, bw75, bw100,... )

definitionList.name: Message Identifier
descriptionList: This IE identifies the warning message.

elementList.name: Message Identifier
elementList.description: This IE is set by the 5GC, transferred to the UE by the gNB node.

definitionList.name: Serial Number
descriptionList:
This IE identifies a particular message
from the source and type indicated by the Message Identifier and is altered
every time the message with a given Message Identifier is changed.

definitionList.name: UAC Assistance Information
descriptionList:
This information
element contains assistance information helping the gNB-DU to set parameters
for Unified Access Class barring.

elementList.name: Access Category
elementList.description: Indicates the operator defined Access Category as defined in subclause 6.3.2 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Access Identity
elementList.description: Indicates whether access attempt is allowed for each Access Identity as defined in subclause 6.3.2 in TS 38.331 [8].

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of UAC PLMN
  Ids. Value is 12.

Maximum no. of signalled categories per PLMN.
  Value is 64.

definitionList.name: UAC Action
descriptionList:
This IE indicates which signalling traffic is expected to be reduced by the gNB-CU, as defined
in clause 8.7.7 of TS 38.413 [3]

elementList.name: UAC Action
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Reject RRC connection establishments for non-emergency MO DT, Reject RRC connection establishments for Signalling, Permit Emergency Sessions and mobile terminated services only, Permit High Priority Sessions and mobile terminated services only,…)

definitionList.name: UAC reduction Indication
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the percentage of
signalling traffic expected to be reduced by the gNB-CU, relative to the
instantaneous incoming rate from the gNB-DU

elementList.name: UAC reduction Indication
elementList.description: Value 0 indicates that no access rate reduction is desired. In this version of specification, value 99 indicates the highest desired rate reduction.

definitionList.name: Additional SIB Message List
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the list of additional
SIB messages containing all the remaining segments of a public warning message if segmentation is applied to such
message.

elementList.name: Additional SIB Message List Item IEs
Additional SIB
elementList.description: SIB message containing one segment of a public warning message, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of additional segments of
  a public warning message. Value is 63.

definitionList.name: Cell Type
descriptionList: This IE provides the cell coverage area.

definitionList.name: Configured TAC Indication
descriptionList:
This IE indicates that the TAC with which
this IE is associated, is only configured for the cell, but not broadcast.

NOTE:      This IE is defined in accordance to the
possibility foreseen in TS 38.331 [8] to not broadcast the TAC if the NR cell
only supports PSCell/SCell functionality.

definitionList.name: Trace Activation
descriptionList:
This IE defines parameters related to a trace
session activation.

elementList.name: Trace ID
elementList.description: This IE is composed of the following: Trace Reference defined in TS 32.422 [29] (leftmost 6 octets, with PLMN information encoded as in 9.3.1.14), and Trace Recording Session Reference defined in TS 32.422 [29] (last 2 octets).

elementList.name: Interfaces To Trace
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap represents an NG-RAN node interface: first bit = NG-C, second bit = Xn-C, third bit = Uu, fourth bit = F1-C, fifth bit = E1: other bits reserved for future use. Value '1' indicates 'should be traced'. Value '0' indicates 'should not be traced'.

elementList.name: Trace Depth
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (minimum, medium, maximum, minimumWithoutVendorSpecificExtension, mediumWithoutVendorSpecificExtension, maximumWithoutVendorSpecificExtension, …)
elementList.description: Defined in TS 32.422 [29].

elementList.name: Trace Collection Entity IP Address
elementList.description: For File based Reporting. Defined in TS 32.422 [29]. Should be ignored if URI is present.

elementList.name: Trace Collection Entity URI
elementList.description: For Streaming based Reporting. Defined in TS 32.422 [11] Replaces Trace Collection Entity IP Address if present

definitionList.name: Intended TDD DL-UL Configuration
descriptionList:
This IE contains the subcarrier spacing,
cyclic prefix and TDD DL-UL slot configuration of an NR cell that the receiving
gNB needs to take into account for cross-link interference mitigation, and/or for NR-DC power coordination, when
operating its own cells.

elementList.name: NR SCS
elementList.description: The values scs15, scs30, scs60 and scs120 corresponds to the sub carrier spacing in TS 38.104 [17].

elementList.name: NR Cyclic Prefix
elementList.description: The type of cyclic prefix, which determines the number of symbols in a slot.

elementList.name: NR DL-UL Transmission Periodicity
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (ms0p5, ms0p625, ms1, ms1p25, ms2, ms2p5, ms3, ms4, ms5, ms10, ms20, ms40, ms60, ms80, ms100, ms120, ms140, ms160, …)
elementList.description: The periodicity is expressed in the format msXpYZ, and equals X.YZ milliseconds.

elementList.name: All DL
elementList.description: This choice implies that all symbols in the slot are DL symbols.

elementList.name: All UL
elementList.description: This choice implies that all symbols in the slot are UL symbols.

elementList.name: Number of DL Symbols
elementList.description: Number of consecutive DL symbols in the slot identified by Slot Index. If extended cyclic prefix is used, the maximum value is 11. The Permutation IE indicates the location of DL symbols in the slot.

elementList.name: Number of UL Symbols
elementList.description: Number of consecutive UL symbols in the slot identified by Slot Index. If extended cyclic prefix is used, the maximum value is 11. The Permutation IE indicates the location of UL symbols in the slot.

elementList.name: Permutation
elementList.description: If not present, the default value is DFU.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum length of number of slots in a 10-ms
  period. Value is 5120.

definitionList.name: Additional RRM Policy Index
descriptionList:
The Additional
RRM Policy Index IE is used to provide additional information independent
from the Subscriber Profile ID
for RAT/Frequency priority as specified in TS 36.300 [20].

definitionList.name: DU-CU RIM Information
descriptionList:
This IE conveys the Remote Interference
Management message from the gNB-DU to the gNB-CU.

elementList.name: RIM-RS Detection Status
elementList.description: This IE indicates detection status of RIM-RS in gNB-DU

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. cells that can be served by a gNB-DU.
  Value is 512.

definitionList.name: CU-DU RIM Information
descriptionList:
This IE conveys the Remote Interference
Management message from the gNB-CU to the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: RIM-RS Detection Status
elementList.description: This IE indicates detection status of RIM-RS in remote gNB(s).

definitionList.name: gNB Set ID
descriptionList:
The gNB Set
ID IE is used to identify a group of gNBs which transmit the same RIM-RS.

definitionList.name: Lower Layer Presence Status Change
descriptionList:
This IE indicates lower
layer resources’ presence status shall be changed.

elementList.name: Lower Layer Presence Status Change
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (suspend lower layers, resume lower layers ...)
elementList.description: "suspend lower layers" will store CellGroupConfig. From the parameters received within the ReconfigurationWithSync, only the sPCellConfigCommon is stored. "resume lower layers" shall restore SCG and it is set only after "suspend lower layers" has been indicated.

definitionList.name: Traffic Mapping Information
descriptionList:
This IE includes the information used by
the gNB-DU to perform traffic mapping.

elementList.name: IP to layer2 Traffic Mapping Info
IP to layer2 Traffic Mapping Info To Add
elementList.description: This IE indicates the mapping information for forwarding of IP traffic to layer-2 to be added.

elementList.name: IP to layer2 Traffic Mapping Info To Remove
elementList.description: This IE indicates the mapping information for forwarding of IP traffic to layer 2 to be removed.

elementList.name: BAP layer BH RLC channel Mapping Info
BAP layer BH RLC channel Mapping Info To Add
elementList.reference: BAP layer BH RLC channel mapping Information List 9.3.1.98
elementList.description: This IE indicates the mapping information for forwarding of traffic on BAP layer to be added.

elementList.name: BAP layer BH RLC channel Mapping Info To Remove
elementList.description: This IE indicates the mapping information for forwarding of traffic on BAP layer to be removed.

definitionList.name: IP-to-layer-2 traffic mapping Information List
descriptionList:
This IE includes the information used by
the IAB-donor-DU to perform the mapping from IP layer to layer-2. If this IE
appears in the UE-associated F1AP signalling, the BH Information IE should
only contain the BAP Routing ID IE.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of mapping entries, the maximum
  value is 67108864 (i.e. 2^26).

definitionList.name: IP Header Information
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the IP header information
included in the Traffic Mapping Information IE for DL traffic.

elementList.name: Destination IAB TNL Address
elementList.description: This IE indicates the destination IPv4 address, or IPv6 address or IPv6 prefix of a DL packet.

elementList.name: DSCP
elementList.description: This IE indicates the DS information of DL traffic.

elementList.name: IPv6 Flow Label
elementList.description: This IE indicates the IPv6 Flow Label of DL traffic.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of DSCP values related to a
  destination IP address that can be mapped to one BH RLC channel, the maximum
  value is 64.

definitionList.name: BAP layer BH RLC channel mapping Information List
descriptionList:
This IE includes the information used by
the IAB-DU to perform the BH RLC channel mapping when forwarding traffic on BAP
sublayer.

When this IE is included in the
UE-associated F1AP signalling for setting up or modifying a BH RLC channel, it
contains either the Prior-Hop BAP Address IE and the Ingress BH RLC
CH ID IE to configure a mapping in downlink direction, or the Next-Hop
BAP address IE and the Egress BH RLC CH ID IE to configure a mapping
in uplink direction. This IE indicates the BH RLC channel served by the
collocated IAB-MT.

When this IE is included in the
non-UE-associated F1AP signalling, it shall contain the Prior-Hop BAP
Address IE, the Ingress BH RLC CH ID IE, the Next-Hop BAP address
IE and the Egress BH RLC CH ID IE.

elementList.name: BAP layer BH RLC channel mapping info Item
Ingress Non-F1-terminating Topology Indicator
elementList.description: If present, indicates that the ingress topology for this entry is the non-F1-terminating topology of the boundary IAB-node.

elementList.name: Egress Non-F1-terminating Topology Indicator
elementList.description: If present, indicates that the egress topology for this entry is the non-F1-terminating topology of the boundary IAB-node.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of mapping entries, the maximum
  value is 67108864 (i.e. 2^26).

definitionList.name: Mapping Information to Remove
descriptionList:
This IE includes a list of mapping
information indexes corresponding to the mapping configuration which is to be
removed.

elementList.name: Mapping Information to Remove List Item

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of mapping entries, the maximum
  value is 67108864 (i.e. 2^26).

definitionList.name: Mapping Information Index
descriptionList:
This IE includes an index of one mapping
information entry at the IAB-donor-DU or an IAB-DU.

definitionList.name: IAB TNL Addresses Requested
descriptionList:
The IAB TNL Addresses Requested IE
indicates the number of IPv4 or IPv6 addresses or IPv6 address prefixes
requested for the indicated usage.

elementList.name: TNL Addresses or Prefixes Requested - All Traffic
elementList.description: The number of TNL addresses/ IPv6 prefixes requested for all traffic.

elementList.name: TNL Addresses or Prefixes Requested - F1-C traffic
elementList.description: The number of TNL addresses/IPv6 prefixes requested for F1-C traffic.

elementList.name: TNL Addresses or Prefixes Requested - F1-U traffic
elementList.description: The number of TNL addresses/ IPv6 prefixes requested for F1-U traffic.

elementList.name: TNL Addresses or Prefixes Requested - Non-F1 traffic
elementList.description: The number of TNL addresses/ IPv6 prefixes requested for non-F1 traffic.

definitionList.name: IAB TNL Address
descriptionList:
The IAB TNL Address IE
indicates an IPv4 or IPv6 address or an IPv6 address prefix assigned to an
IAB-node.

elementList.name: IPv4 Address
elementList.description: The IPv4 address allocated to an IAB-node.

elementList.name: IPv6 Address
elementList.description: The IPv6 address allocated to an IAB-node.

elementList.name: IPv6 Prefix
elementList.description: The IPv6 address prefix allocated to an IAB-node.

definitionList.name: Uplink BH Non-UP Traffic Mapping
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the mapping of uplink
non-UP traffic to a BH RLC channel and BAP Routing ID.

elementList.name: Uplink Non-UP Traffic Mapping List Item IEs

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of non-UP traffic mappings. Value
  is 32.

definitionList.name: Non-UP Traffic Type
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the type of non-UP
traffic.

elementList.name: Non-UP Traffic Type
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(UE-associated F1AP, non-UE-associated F1AP, non-F1, BAP control PDU, ...)

definitionList.name: IAB Info IAB-donor-CU
descriptionList: This IE contains cell-specific IAB-related information sent by an IAB-donor-CU to an IAB-DU or IAB-donor-DU.

elementList.name: IAB STC Info
elementList.description: Contains STC configuration of IAB-DU or IAB-donor-DU.

definitionList.name: IAB Info IAB-DU
descriptionList: This IE contains cell-specific IAB-related information sent by an IAB-DU or IAB-donor-DU to an IAB-donor-CU.

elementList.name: Multiplexing Info
elementList.description: Contains the information about multiplexing with cells configured for a collocated IAB-MT. Applicable for an IAB-DU.

elementList.name: IAB STC Info
elementList.description: Contains the information about STC configuration of IAB-DU or IAB-donor-DU.

definitionList.name: gNB-DU Cell Resource Configuration
descriptionList:
This IE contains the resource configuration
of the cells served by a gNB-DU, i.e. the TDD/FDD resource parameters for each
activated cell (TS 38.213 [31], clause 11.1.1).

elementList.name: Subcarrier Spacing
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (kHz15, kHz30, kHz60, kHz120, kHz240, spare3, spare2, spare1, …)
elementList.description: Subcarrier spacing used as reference for the TDD/FDD slot configuration.

elementList.name: DUF Transmission Periodicity
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (ms0p5, ms0p625, ms1, ms1p25, ms2, ms2p5, ms5, ms10, …)

elementList.name: DUF Slot Configuration Item
elementList.description: The maxNrofSlots in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: DUF Slot Format Index
elementList.description: Index into Table 11.1.1-1 and Table 14-2 in TS 38.213 [31], excluding the last row in Table 14-2.

elementList.name: HSNA Transmission Periodicity
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (ms0p5, ms0p625, ms1, ms1p25, ms2, ms2p5, ms5, ms10, ms20, ms40, ms80, ms160, …)

elementList.name: HSNA Downlink
elementList.description: HSNA value for downlink symbols in a slot.

elementList.name: HSNA Uplink
elementList.description: HSNA value for uplink symbols in a slot.

elementList.name: HSNA Flexible
elementList.description: HSNA value for flexible symbols in a slot.

elementList.name: RB set Index
elementList.description: Refers to an RB set defined by RB Set Configuration.

elementList.name: Slot Index
elementList.description: Indicates an index to a slot within the HSNA Transmission Periodicity.

elementList.name: HSNA Downlink
elementList.description: HSNA value for downlink symbols in a slot, for an RB set.

elementList.name: HSNA Uplink
elementList.description: HSNA value for uplink symbols in a slot, for an RB set.

elementList.name: HSNA Flexible
elementList.description: HSNA value for flexible symbols in a slot, for an RB set.

elementList.name: Child IAB-Nodes NA Resource List
elementList.description: List of child IAB-nodes served by the IAB-DU or IAB-donor-DU.

elementList.name: Child IAB--Nodes NA Resource List Item
gNB-CU UE F1AP ID
elementList.description: Identifier of a child-node IAB-MT at the IAB-donor-CU.

elementList.name: gNB-DU UE F1AP ID
elementList.description: Identifier of a child-node IAB-MT at an IAB-DU or IAB-donor-DU.

elementList.name: NA Resource Configuration List
elementList.description: List of not-available resources of this cell for this child IAB-node

elementList.name: NA Downlink
elementList.description: Indicates whether downlink symbols, in a slot, are available to serve the child IAB-node.

elementList.name: NA Uplink
elementList.description: Indicates whether uplink symbols, in a slot, are available to serve the child IAB-node.

elementList.name: NA Flexible
elementList.description: Indicates whether flexible symbols, in a slot, are available to serve the child IAB-node.

elementList.name: Parent IAB Nodes NA Resource Configuration List
elementList.description: List of unavailable resources of this cell for this IAB-node.

elementList.name: Parent IAB Nodes NA Resource Configuration Item
NA Downlink
elementList.description: Indicates whether downlink symbols, in a slot, are unavailable to serve the IAB-node.

elementList.name: NA Uplink
elementList.description: Indicates whether uplink symbols, in a slot, are unavailable to serve the IAB-node.

elementList.name: NA Flexible
elementList.description: Indicates whether flexible symbols, in a slot, are unavailable to serve the IAB-node.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of slots in 10ms. Value is 320.
Maximum no. of symbols in a slot. Value is 14.

Maximum no of "Hard", "Soft"
  or "Not available" slots in 160ms. Value is 5120.

Maximum no. of RB sets per IAB-DU cell. Value
  is 8

Maximum number of child nodes served by an
  IAB-DU or an IAB-donor-DU. Value is 1024.

definitionList.name: Multiplexing Info
descriptionList:
This IE contains information
about the multiplexing capabilities between the gNB-DU’s cell and the cells configured
on the collocated IAB-MT.

elementList.name: NR Cell Identity
elementList.description: Cell identity of a serving cell configured for a collocated IAB-MT.

elementList.name: DU_RX/MT_RX
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (supported, not supported, supported and FDM required)
elementList.description: An indication of whether the IAB-node supports simultaneous reception at its DU and MT side.

elementList.name: DU_TX/MT_TX
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (supported, not supported, supported and FDM required)
elementList.description: An indication of whether the IAB-node supports simultaneous transmission at its DU and MT side.

elementList.name: DU_TX/MT_RX
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (supported, not supported, supported and FDM required)
elementList.description: An indication of whether the IAB-node supports simultaneous transmission at its DU and reception at its MT side.

elementList.name: DU_RX/MT_TX
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (supported, not supported, supported and FDM required)
elementList.description: An indication of whether the IAB-node supports simultaneous reception at its DU and transmission at its MT side.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of serving cells for IAB-MT. Value
  is 32, as defined by the maxNrofServingCells in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: IAB STC Info
descriptionList:
This IE contains cell SSB Transmission
Configuration (STC) information of an IAB-DU or IAB-donor-DU. The information
is used by neighbour IAB-MTs for discovery and measurements of this IAB-DU or
IAB-donor-DU.

elementList.name: SSB Frequency Info
elementList.description: The SSB central frequency.

elementList.name: SSB Subcarrier Spacing
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (kHz15, kHz30, kHz120, kHz240, spare3, spare2, spare1, …)
elementList.description: The SSB subcarrier spacing.

elementList.name: SSB Transmission Periodicity
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (sf5, sf10, sf20, sf40, sf80, sf160, sf320, sf640, ,,,)

elementList.name: SSB Transmission Timing Offset
elementList.description: SSB transmission timing offset in number of half-frames.

elementList.name: CHOICE SSB Transmission Bitmap
elementList.description: The SSB-ToMeasure IE defined in TS 38.331 [8].

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of STC configurations. Value is 5.
  This includes 1 STC configuration for access and 4 STC configurations for
  backhaul.
Maximum value of NR ARFCNs. Value is 3279165.

definitionList.name: BAP Routing ID
descriptionList: This IE indicates the BAP Routing ID.

definitionList.name: BAP Address
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the BAP address of an IAB-node
or of an IAB-donor-DU, and it is part of the BAP Routing ID.

elementList.name: BAP Address
elementList.description: Corresponds to the bap-Address-r16, defined in subclause 6.2.2 or subclause 6.3.2 of TS 38.331 [8], or the iab-donor-DU-BAP-Address-r16 defined in subclause 6.2.2 of TS 38.331[8].

definitionList.name: BAP Path ID
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the BAP path ID, which is
part of the BAP Routing ID.

elementList.name: BAP Path ID
elementList.description: Corresponds to the bap-Pathid-r16 defined in subclause 6.3.2 of TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: BH RLC Channel ID
descriptionList:
This IE uniquely identifies a BH RLC channel
in the link between IAB-MT of the IAB-node and IAB-DU of the parent IAB-node or
IAB-donor-DU.

definitionList.name: BH Information
descriptionList:
This IE includes the backhaul information
for UL or DL.

elementList.name: BAP Routing ID
elementList.description: This IE is not needed for the BAP control PDU. For UL F1-U traffic, the BAP address included in this IE also indicates the IAB-donor-DU via which the DL traffic is transmitted.

elementList.name: Egress BH RLC CH List Item
Next-Hop BAP Address
elementList.description: This IE identifies the next-hop node on the backhaul path to receive the packet. The value of this IE should be unique in the whole list.

elementList.name: Egress BH RLC CH ID
elementList.description: This IE identifies the BH RLC channel in the link between the IAB node/IAB-donor-DU and the node identified by the Next-Hop BAP Address IE.

elementList.name: Non-F1-Terminating Topology Indicator
elementList.description: If present, indicates that the Next-Hop BAP Address and Egress BH RLC CH ID contained in this IE pertain to the non-F1-terminating topology of the boundary IAB-node.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of egress links. Value is 2.

definitionList.name: Control Plane Traffic Type
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the control plane traffic
type carried over a BH RLC channel.

elementList.name: Control Plane Traffic Type
elementList.description: Control plane traffic types with different priorities are identified by the different codepoints in this IE, where 1 has the highest priority.

definitionList.name: NR V2X Services Authorized
descriptionList:
This IE provides information
on the authorization status of the UE to use the NR
sidelink for V2X services.

elementList.name: Vehicle UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized as Vehicle UE.

elementList.name: Pedestrian UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized as Pedestrian UE.

definitionList.name: LTE V2X Services Authorized
descriptionList:
This IE provides information
on the authorization status of the UE to use the LTE sidelink
for V2X services.

elementList.name: Vehicle UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized as Vehicle UE.

elementList.name: Pedestrian UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized as Pedestrian UE.

definitionList.name: LTE UE Sidelink Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate
descriptionList:
This IE provides information
on the Aggregate Maximum Bitrate of the UE’s communication over LTE sidelink.

elementList.name: LTE UE Sidelink Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate
elementList.description: Value 0 shall be considered as a logical error by the receiving gNB-DU.

definitionList.name: NR UE Sidelink Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate
descriptionList:
This IE provides information
on the Aggregate Maximum Bitrate of the UE’s communication over NR sidelink.

elementList.name: NR UE Sidelink Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate
elementList.description: Value 0 shall be considered as a logical error by the receiving gNB-DU.

definitionList.name: SL DRB ID
descriptionList: This IE uniquely identifies a SL DRB for a UE.

elementList.name: SL DRB ID
elementList.description: Corresponds to the SLRB-Uu-ConfigIndex defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: PC5 QoS Flow Identifier
descriptionList:
This IE uniquely identifies one sidelink QoS flow
between the UE and the network in the scope of UE.

elementList.name: PC5 QoS Flow Identifier
elementList.description: Corresponds to the SL-QoS-FlowIdentity defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: PC5 QoS Parameters
descriptionList: This IE defines the QoS to be applied to a SL DRB.

elementList.name: PC5 QoS Flow Bit Rates
elementList.description: Only applies for GBR QoS Flows.

elementList.name: Guaranteed Flow Bit Rate
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate for the PC5 QoS flow. Details in TS 23.287 [40].

elementList.name: Maximum Flow Bit Rate
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate for the PC5 QoS flow. Details in TS 23.287 [40].

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of PC5 QoS
  flows allowed towards one UE for NR sidelink communication, the maximum
  value is 2048.

definitionList.name: Alternative QoS Parameters Set Index
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the QoS parameters set which can currently be
fulfilled.

elementList.name: Alternative QoS Parameters Set Index
elementList.description: Indicates the index of the item within the Alternative QoS Parameters Set List IE corresponding to the currently fulfilled alternative QoS parameters set.

definitionList.name: Alternative QoS Parameters Set Notify Index
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the QoS
parameters set which can currently be fulfilled.

elementList.name: Alternative QoS Parameters Set Notify Index
elementList.description: Indicates the index of the item within the the Alternative QoS Parameters Set List IE corresponding to the currently fulfilled alternative QoS parameters set. Value 0 indicates that NG-RAN cannot even fulfil the lowest alternative parameter set.

definitionList.name: Alternative QoS Parameters Set List
descriptionList:
This IE
contains alternative sets of QoS parameters which the gNB can indicate to be
fulfilled when notification control is enabled and it cannot fulfil the
requested list of QoS parameters.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of alternative sets of QoS
  Parameters allowed for the QoS profile. Value is 8.

definitionList.name: Non Dynamic PQI Descriptor
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the QoS Characteristics
for a standardized or pre-configured PQI for sidelink.

elementList.name: 5QI
elementList.description: This IE contains the standardized or pre-configured PQI as specified in TS 23.287 [40]

elementList.name: QoS Priority Level
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. When included overrides standardized or pre-configured value.

elementList.name: Averaging Window
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. When included overrides standardized or pre-configured value.

elementList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. When included overrides standardized or pre-configured value.

definitionList.name: Dynamic PQI Descriptor
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the QoS Characteristics
for a Non-standardised or not pre-configured PQI for sidelink.

elementList.name: QoS Priority Level
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Packet Delay Budget
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Packet Error Rate
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Averaging Window
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. This IE shall be included if the Delay Critical IE is set to "delay critical" and is ignored otherwise.

conditionList.explanation:
This IE shall be
  present if the PC5
  QoS Flow Bit Rates IE is present in the PC5 QoS parameters IE.

definitionList.name: TNL Capacity Indicator
descriptionList:
The TNL Capacity Indicator IE
indicates the offered and available capacity of the Transport Network experienced
by the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: DL TNL Offered Capacity
elementList.description: Maximum capacity offered by the transport portion of the gNB-DU – gNB-CU in kbps

elementList.name: DL TNL Available Capacity
elementList.description: Available capacity over the transport portion serving the node in percentage. Value 100 corresponds to the offered capacity

elementList.name: UL TNL Offered Capacity
elementList.description: Maximum capacity offered by the transport portion of the gNB-DU – gNB-CU in kbps

elementList.name: UL TNL Available Capacity
elementList.description: Available capacity over the transport portion serving the node in percentage. Value 100 corresponds to the offered capacity

definitionList.name: Radio Resource Status
descriptionList:
The Radio Resource Status IE
indicates the usage of the PRBs per cell for MIMO, per SSB area and per slice for all traffic in
Downlink and Uplink.

elementList.name: SSB Area Radio Resource Status List
SSB Area Radio Resource Status Item
SSB Area DL GBR PRB usage
elementList.description: Per SSB area DL GBR PRB usage

elementList.name: SSB Area UL GBR PRB usage
elementList.description: Per SSB area UL GBR PRB usage

elementList.name: SSB Area DL non-GBR PRB usage
elementList.description: Per SSB area DL non-GBR PRB usage

elementList.name: SSB Area UL non-GBR PRB usage
elementList.description: Per SSB area UL non-GBR PRB usage

elementList.name: SSB Area DL Total PRB usage
elementList.description: Per SSB area DL Total PRB usage

elementList.name: SSB Area UL Total PRB usage
elementList.description: Per SSB area UL Total PRB usage

elementList.name: PLMN Identity
elementList.description: Broadcast PLMN

elementList.name: S-NSSAI DL GBR PRB usage
elementList.description: Per slice DL GBR PRB usage in percentage of the cell total PRB number.

elementList.name: S-NSSAI UL GBR PRB usage
elementList.description: Per slice UL GBR PRB usage for this slice in percentage of the cell total PRB number.

elementList.name: S-NSSAI DL non-GBR PRB usage
elementList.description: Per slice DL non-GBR PRB usage for this slice in percentage of the cell total PRB number.

elementList.name: S-NSSAI UL non-GBR PRB usage
elementList.description: Per slice UL non-GBR PRB usage for this slice in percentage of the cell total PRB number.

elementList.name: Slice DL Total PRB allocation
elementList.description: Total amount of DL PRBs available per cell for this slice if all the resources the slice could access were usable.

elementList.name: Slice UL Total PRB allocation
elementList.description: Total amount of UL PRBs available per cell for this slice if all the resources the slice could access were usable.

elementList.name: DL GBR PRB usage for MIMO
elementList.description: Per cell DL GBR PRB usage for MIMO in percentage of the cell total PRB number as defined in TS 38.314 [32].

elementList.name: UL GBR PRB usage for MIMO
elementList.description: Per cell UL GBR PRB usage for MIMO in percentage of the cell total PRB number as defined in TS 38.314 [32].

elementList.name: DL non-GBR PRB usage for MIMO
elementList.description: Per cell DL non-GBR PRB usage for MIMO in percentage of the cell total PRB number as defined in TS 38.314 [32].

elementList.name: UL non-GBR PRB usage for MIMO
elementList.description: Per cell UL non-GBR PRB usage for MIMO in percentage of the cell total PRB number as defined in TS 38.314 [32].

elementList.name: DL Total PRB usage for MIMO
elementList.description: Per cell DL Total PRB usage for MIMO in percentage of the cell total PRB number as defined in TS 38.314 [32].

elementList.name: UL Total PRB usage for MIMO
elementList.description: Per cell UL Total PRB usage for MIMO in percentage of the cell total PRB number as defined in TS 38.314 [32].

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. SSB Areas that can be served by a
  cell. Value is 64.

Maximum no. of signalled slice support items.
  Value is 1024.

Maximum no. of PLMN Ids.broadcast in a cell.
  Value is 12.

definitionList.name: Composite Available Capacity Group
descriptionList:
The Composite Available Capacity Group
IE indicates the overall available resource level per cell and per SSB area in
the cell in Downlink and Uplink.

elementList.name: Composite Available Capacity Downlink
elementList.description: For the Downlink

elementList.name: Composite Available Capacity Uplink
elementList.description: For the Uplink, including both NUL and SUL (if available)

elementList.name: Composite Available Capacity Supplementary Uplink
elementList.description: For the SUL

definitionList.name: Composite Available Capacity
descriptionList:
The Composite Available Capacity IE
indicates the overall available resource level in the cell in either Downlink
or Uplink.

elementList.name: Capacity Value
elementList.description: ‘0’ indicates no resource is available, Measured on a linear scale.

definitionList.name: Cell Capacity Class Value
descriptionList:
The Cell Capacity Class Value IE
indicates the value that classifies the cell capacity with regards to the other
cells. The Cell Capacity Class Value IE only indicates resources
that are configured for traffic purposes.

elementList.name: Capacity Class Value
elementList.description: Value 1 shall indicate the minimum cell capacity, and 100 shall indicate the maximum cell capacity. There should be a linear relation between cell capacity and Cell Capacity Class Value.

definitionList.name: Capacity Value
descriptionList:
The Capacity Value IE indicates the
amount of resources per cell and per SSB area that are available relative to
the total gNB-DU resources. The capacity value should be measured and reported
so that the minimum gNB-DU resource usage of existing services is reserved
according to implementation. The Capacity Value IE can be weighted
according to the ratio of cell capacity class values, if available.

elementList.name: Capacity Value
elementList.description: Value 0 shall indicate no available capacity, and 100 shall indicate maximum available capacity with respect to the whole cell. Capacity Value should be measured on a linear scale.

elementList.name: SSB Area Capacity Value
elementList.description: Value 0 shall indicate no available capacity, and 100 shall indicate maximum available capacity . SSB Area Capacity Value should be measured on a linear scale.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  SSB Areas that can be served by a cell. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: Slice Available Capacity
descriptionList:
The Slice Available Capacity IE
indicates the amount of resources per network slice that are available per cell
relative to the total gNB-DU resources per cell. The Slice Available Capacity
Value Downlink IE and the Slice Available Capacity Value Uplink IE
can be weighted according to the ratio of the corresponding cell capacity class
values contained in the Composite Available Capacity
Group IE, if available.

elementList.name: PLMN Identity
elementList.description: Broadcast PLMN

elementList.name: Slice Available Capacity Value Downlink
elementList.description: Value 0 shall indicate no available capacity, and 100 shall indicate maximum available capacity . Slice Available Capacity Value Downlink should be measured on a linear scale.

elementList.name: Slice Available Capacity Value Uplink
elementList.description: Value 0 shall indicate no available capacity, and 100 shall indicate maximum available capacity . Slice Available Capacity Value Uplink should be measured on a linear scale.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of signalled slice support items.
  Value is 1024.

Maximum no. of PLMN Ids.broadcast in a cell.
  Value is 12.

definitionList.name: Number of Active UEs
descriptionList:
The Number of Active UEs IE
indicates the mean number of active UEs as defined in TS 38.314 [32].

elementList.name: Mean number of Active UEs
elementList.description: As defined in TS 38.314 [32] and where value "1" is equivalent to 0.1 Active UEs, value "2" is equivalent to 0.2 Active UEs, value n is equivalent to n/10 Active UEs.

definitionList.name: Hardware Load Indicator
descriptionList:
The Hardware Load Indicator IE
indicates the status of the Hardware Load.

elementList.name: DL Hardware Load Indicator
elementList.description: This indicates the load in percent

elementList.name: UL Hardware Load Indicator
elementList.description: This indicates the load in percent

definitionList.name: NR Carrier List
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the SCS-specific carriers
per TDD, per DL, per UL or per SUL of an NR cell.

elementList.name: NR SCS
elementList.description: SCS for the corresponding carrier.

elementList.name: Offset to Carrier
elementList.description: Offset in frequency domain between Point A (lowest subcarrier of common RB 0) and the lowest usable subcarrier on this carrier in number of PRBs (using the NR SCS IE defined for this carrier). The maximum value corresponds to 275×8−1. See TS 38.211 [33], clause 4.4.2.

elementList.name: Carrier Bandwidth
elementList.description: Width of this carrier in number of PRBs (using the NR SCS IE defined for this carrier). See TS 38.211 [33], clause 4.4.2.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of SCS-specific carriers per TDD,
  per DL, per UL or per SUL of an NR cell. Value is 5.

Maximum no. of Physical Resource Blocks. Value
  is 275.

definitionList.name: SSB Positions In Burst
descriptionList:
Indicates the time domain positions of the
transmitted SS-blocks in a half frame with SS/PBCH
blocks as defined in TS 38.213 [31], clause 4.1.

elementList.name: CHOICE ssb-PositionsInBurst
elementList.description: The first/ leftmost bit corresponds to SS/PBCH block index 0, the second bit corresponds to SS/PBCH block index 1, and so on. Value 0 in the bitmap indicates that the corresponding SS/PBCH block is not transmitted while value 1 indicates that the corresponding SS/PBCH block is transmitted.

definitionList.name: NR PRACH Configuration
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the PRACH resources by a
NR cell.

definitionList.name: NR PRACH Configuration List
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the PRACH resources used
or reserved in the UL carrier(s) or SUL carrier(s) of the current NR cell.

elementList.name: NR PRACH Configuration Item
elementList.description: Length=0 means releasing of all NR PRACH Configuration Items for this UL or SUL.

elementList.name: NR SCS
elementList.description: The SCS of the carrier to which this PRACH Configuration Item relates, i.e. in Section 5.3.2 in TS 38.211 [33]. The values scs15, scs30, scs60 and scs120 corresponds to the sub carrier spacing in TS 38.104 [17]. NOTE: Its value may not be identical to the SCS of PRACH.

elementList.name: PRACH Frequency Start from Carrier
elementList.description: Lowest number of resource blocks which can be used to deliver MSG1 or the preamble part of MSGA, counting from the start number of the corresponding carrier. Identical to in Section 5.1.2.2.2 in TS 38.214 [34] plus msg1-FrequencyStart or msgA-RO-FrequencyStart-r16 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: PRACH-FDM
elementList.description: in Section 6.3.3.2 in TS 38.211 [33].

elementList.name: PRACH Configuration Index
elementList.description: See Section 6.3.3.2 in TS 38.211 [33].

elementList.name: SSB per RACH Occasion
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (oneEighth, oneFourth, oneHalf, one, two, four, eight, sixteen, ...)
elementList.description: Number of SSBs per RACH occasion. Value oneEight corresponds to one SSB associated with 8 RACH occasions, value oneFourth corresponds to one SSB associated with 4 RACH occasions, and so on.

elementList.name: CHOICE FreqDomainLength
elementList.description: For the case of PRACH resources reserved for BFR or MSG1-based SI Request, L139 is always used.

elementList.name: Root Sequence Index
elementList.description: See Section 6.3.3.1 in TS 38.211 [33].

elementList.name: Restricted Set Config
elementList.description: See Section 6.3.3.1 in TS 38.211 [33].

elementList.name: PRACH SCS
elementList.description: Subcarrier Spacing of PRACH, i.e. in Section 5.3.2 in TS 38.211 [33].

elementList.name: Root Sequence Index
elementList.description: See Section 6.3.3.1 in TS 38.211 [33].

elementList.name: Zero Correlation Zone Config
elementList.description: See Section 6.3.3.1 in TS 38.211 [33].

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of Physical Resource Blocks minus
  1. Value is 274.

Maximum no. of PRACH Configuration. Value is
  16.

definitionList.name: TSC Traffic Characteristics
descriptionList:
This IE provides the traffic
characteristics of TSC QoS flows.

definitionList.name: TSC Assistance Information
descriptionList:
This IE provides the TSC assistance
information for a TSC QoS flow in the uplink or downlink (see TS 23.501 [21]).

elementList.name: Periodicity
elementList.description: Periodicity as specified in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Burst Arrival Time
elementList.description: Burst Arrival Time as specified in TS 23.501 [21].

definitionList.name: Periodicity
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Periodicity as
defined in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Periodicity
elementList.description: Periodicity expressed in units of 1 us.

definitionList.name: Burst Arrival Time
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Burst Arrival Time as
defined in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Burst Arrival Time
elementList.description: Encoded in the same format as the ReferenceTime IE as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. The value is truncated to 1 us granularity.

definitionList.name: Extended Packet Delay Budget
descriptionList: This IE indicates the Packet Delay Budget for a QoS flow.

elementList.name: Extended Packet Delay Budget
elementList.description: Upper bound value for the delay that a packet may experience expressed in unit of 0.01ms.

definitionList.name: RLC Duplication Information
descriptionList:
The IE contains the RLC duplication information in case that the
indicated DRB is configured with more than two RLC entities as specified in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: RLC Duplication State Items
elementList.description: Each position in the list represents a secondary RLC entity in ascending order by the logical channel ID in the order of MCG and SCG.

elementList.name: Primary Path Indication
elementList.description: Indicates whether the primary path is located at the gNB-DU for DC based PDCP duplication.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no of Secondary RLC entities. Value is
  3.

definitionList.name: Reporting Request Type
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the type of accurate reference time
information reporting to be handled by the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: Report Periodicity Value
elementList.description: Indicates the periodicity of accurate reference time information report, Unit in radio frame.

definitionList.name: Time Reference Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the time reference information.

elementList.name: Uncertainty
elementList.description: This field indicates the uncertainty of the reference time information provided in ReferenceTimeInfo IE, refer to 6.3.2 of TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: Reference Time
descriptionList: This IE provides the accurate Reference Time information.

elementList.name: Reference Time
elementList.description: Includes the ReferenceTime IE as defined in 6.3.2 of TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: MDT Configuration
descriptionList:
The IE defines the MDT configuration
parameters.

elementList.name: MDT Activation
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(Immediate MDT only, Immediate MDT and Trace, …)

elementList.name: Measurements to Activate
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap indicates a MDT measurement, as defined in TS 37.320 [35]. Second Bit = M2, Fifth Bit = M5, Seventh Bit = M6, Eighth Bit = M7. Value "1" indicates "activate" and value "0" indicates "do not activate". This version of the specification does not use bits 1, bit 3, bit 4 and bit 6.

conditionList.explanation:
This IE shall be present if the Measurements
  to Activate IE has the second bit set to "1".

This IE shall be present if the Measurements
  to Activate IE has the fifth bit set to "1".

This IE shall be present if the Measurements
  to Activate IE has the seventh bit set to "1".

This IE shall be present if the Measurements
  to Activate IE has the eighth bit set to "1".

definitionList.name: MDT PLMN List
descriptionList:
The purpose of the MDT PLMN List IE
is to provide the list of PLMN allowed for MDT.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of PLMNs in the MDT PLMN list.
  Value is 16.

definitionList.name: M5 Configuration
descriptionList:
This IE defines the parameters for M5
measurement collection.

elementList.name: M5 Report Amount
elementList.description: Number of reports.

definitionList.name: M6 Configuration
descriptionList: This IE defines the parameters for M6 measurement collection.

elementList.name: M6 Report Interval
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (ms120, ms240, ms480, ms640, ms1024, ms2048, ms5120, ms10240, ms20480, ms40960, min1,min6, min12, min30,…)

elementList.name: M6 Report Amount
elementList.description: Number of reports.

definitionList.name: M7 Configuration
descriptionList: This IE defines the parameters for M7 measurement collection.

elementList.name: M7 Collection Period
elementList.description: Unit: minutes

elementList.name: M7 Report Amount
elementList.description: Number of reports.

definitionList.name: NID
descriptionList:
This IE is used to identify (together with
a PLMN identifier) a Stand-alone Non-Public Network. The NID is specified in TS
23.003 [23].

definitionList.name: NPN Support Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains NPN related information
associated with Network Slicing information.

definitionList.name: NPN Broadcast Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains NPN related broadcast
information.

elementList.name: CHOICE NPN Broadcast Information per PLMN

definitionList.name: Broadcast SNPN ID List
descriptionList:
This IE contains SNPN related broadcast
information associated with a set of PLMNs.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of NIDs broadcast in a cell. Value
  is 12.

definitionList.name: Broadcast CAG-Identifier List
descriptionList: This IE contains a list of CAG-Identifiers.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of CAG-Identifiers broadcast in a
  cell. Value is 12.

definitionList.name: CAG ID
descriptionList:
This IE is used to identify (together with
a PLMN identifier) a Public Network Integrated NPN, as defined in TS 23.003
[23].

elementList.name: CAG ID
elementList.description: Closed Access Group ID used in NR.

definitionList.name: Broadcast PNI-NPN ID Information
descriptionList: This IE contains a list of PNI-NPN IDs.

elementList.name: Broadcast PNI-NPN ID Information
elementList.description: Broadcast PLMNs

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of broadcast PLMNs by a cell. Value
  is 12.

definitionList.name: Available SNPN ID List
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the list of available
SNPN ID.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of NIDs broadcast in a cell. Value
  is 12.

definitionList.name: Extended Slice Support List
descriptionList:
This IE indicates a list of supported
slices.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of signalled slice support items.
  Value is 65535.

definitionList.name: Positioning Measurement Result
descriptionList:
The purpose of this
information element is to provide the measurement result(s).

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of measured quantities that can be
  configured and reported with one message. Value is 16384.

definitionList.name: UL Angle of Arrival
descriptionList:
This information element contains the
uplink Angle of Arrival measurement.

elementList.name: LCS to GCS Translation AoA
elementList.description: If absent, the azimuth and zenith are provided in GCS.

definitionList.name: UL RTOA Measurement
descriptionList:
This information element contains the
uplink RTOA measurement.

elementList.name: Additional Path List
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Extended Additional Path List IE is included

definitionList.name: Additional Path List
descriptionList:
This information element contains the
additional path results of time measurement.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of additional path measurements. Value is 2.

definitionList.name: gNB Rx-Tx Time Difference
descriptionList:
This information element contains the gNB Rx-Tx
Time Difference measurement.

elementList.name: CHOICE gNB Rx-Tx Time Difference Measurement

definitionList.name: Time Stamp
descriptionList:
This information element contains the time
stamp associated with the measurement.

definitionList.name: TRP Measurement Quality
descriptionList:
This information element contains the TRP’s
best estimate of the quality of the measurement.

definitionList.name: Measurement Beam Information
descriptionList:
This information element contains the
receiving beam information when measuring UL signals.

definitionList.name: NG-RAN Access Point Position
descriptionList:
This IE is used to identify the
geographical position of an NG-RAN Access Point / TRP / TRP Antenna Reference
Points. It is expressed as ellipsoid point with altitude and uncertainty
ellipsoid according to TS 23.032 [36].

elementList.name: Degrees Of Latitude
elementList.description: The IE value (N) is derived by this formula: N£223 X /90 < N+1 X being the latitude in degrees (0°.. 90°).

elementList.name: Degrees Of Longitude
elementList.description: The IE value (N) is derived by this formula: N£224 X /360 < N+1 X being the longitude in degrees (-180°..+180°).

elementList.name: Altitude
elementList.description: The relation between the value (N) and the altitude (a) in meters it describes is N £ a < N+1, except for N=215-1 for which the range is extended to include all greater values of (a).

elementList.name: Uncertainty semi-major
elementList.description: The uncertainty "r" is derived from the "uncertainty code" k by r = 10x(1.1k-1).

elementList.name: Uncertainty semi-minor
elementList.description: The uncertainty "r" is derived from the "uncertainty code" k by r = 10x(1.1k-1).

elementList.name: Uncertainty Altitude
elementList.description: The uncertainty altitude "h" expressed in metres is derived from the "uncertainty code" k, by: h=45x(1.025k-1).

elementList.name: Confidence
elementList.description: In percentage

definitionList.name: Requested SRS Transmission Characteristics
descriptionList:
This IE contains the requested SRS
configuration for the UE for positioning purposes.

elementList.name: Number Of Periodic Transmissions
elementList.description: The number of periodic SRS transmissions requested. The value of ‘0’ represents an infinite number of SRS transmissions.

elementList.name: Number of SRS Resources Per Set
elementList.description: The number of SRS Resources per resource set for SRS transmission.

elementList.name: PeriodicitySRS
elementList.description: Milli-seconds

elementList.name: Spatial Relation Information
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Spatial Relation Information per SRS Resource IE is present.

elementList.name: Spatial Relation Information per SRS Resource
SRS Frequency
elementList.description: NR ARFCN The carrier frequency of SRS transmission bandwidth.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no of requested SRS Resource Sets for
  SRS transmission. Value is 16.
Maximum no of SRS Resources per set. Value is 16.

conditionList.explanation:
This IE shall be present if the Resource
  Type IE is set to the value "Periodic".

definitionList.name: TRP Information
descriptionList:
The TRP Information IE contains
information for one TRP within a gNB-DU.

elementList.name: CHOICE TRP Information Type Response Item
NR PCI
elementList.description: NR Physical Cell ID

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no of TRP information types that can be
  requested and reported with one message. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: PRS Configuration
descriptionList:
This information element contains the DL PRS configuration for the
TRP.

elementList.name: Start PRB
elementList.description: Starting PRB to Point A

elementList.name: Point A
elementList.description: NR ARFCN

elementList.name: Muting Pattern
elementList.description: Muting pattern option 1 is used to mute the whole PRS resource set (within a period)

elementList.name: Muting Pattern
elementList.description: Muting pattern option 2 is used to mute the selected repetition of the resource set (within the period)

elementList.name: PRS Resource List
elementList.description: NR-DL-PRS-Resource-r16 as defined in TS 37.355 [39]

elementList.name: QCL Source PRS Resource Set ID
QCL Source PRS Resource ID
elementList.description: If absent, the QCL source PRS resource ID is the same as the PRS resource ID

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of PRS resource sets. Value is 8.

Maximum no of PRS resources per PRS resource
  set. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: DL-PRS Muting Pattern
descriptionList:
This information element contains the
DL-PRS muting pattern.

definitionList.name: Spatial Direction Information
descriptionList:
This information element contains the
spatial direction information of the DL PRS resources for the TRP.

elementList.name: NR-PRS Beam Information
elementList.description: The spatial directions of DL-PRS Resources for TRP

definitionList.name: SRS Resource Set ID
descriptionList:
This information element indicates a
resource set in the UE for UL SRS transmission.

elementList.name: SRS Resource Set ID
elementList.description: According to TS 38.331 [8]

definitionList.name: Spatial Relation Information
descriptionList:
This information element indicates a
spatial relation for transmission of UL SRS by a UE.

elementList.name: Spatial Relation for Resource ID
elementList.description: According to TS 38.321 [16] and and TS 38.331 [8]

elementList.name: Spatial Relation for Resource ID Item

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of Spatial Relations that can be configured.
   Value is 64.

definitionList.name: SRS Resource Trigger
descriptionList: This information element indicates a DCI code point according to a SRS resource set configuration.

elementList.name: Aperiodic SRS Resource Trigger List
elementList.description: According to TS 38.331 [8]

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of SRS
  trigger states. Value is 3.

definitionList.name: Relative Time 1900
descriptionList:
This information element indicates the initialisation time (e.g. SFN Initalisation Time for a cell,
requested time for an action, etc).

elementList.name: Relative Time 1900
elementList.description: Time in seconds relative to 00:00:00 on 1 January 1900 (calculated as continuous time without leap seconds and traceable to a common time reference) where binary encoding of the integer part is in the first 32 bits and binary encoding of the fraction part in the last 32 bits. The fraction part is expressed with a granularity of 1 /2**32 second

definitionList.name: Geographical Coordinates
descriptionList:
This information element contains the
geographical coordinates for the TRP and any associated ARP(s).

elementList.name: TRP Position
elementList.description: The configured estimated geographical position of the antenna of the cell/TRP.

elementList.name: TRP High Accuracy Access Position
elementList.reference: NG-RAN High Accuracy Access Point Position 9.3.1.190
elementList.description: The configured estimated geographical high accuracy position of the antenna of the cell/TRP.

elementList.name: Reference Point
elementList.description: The reference point is used to derive the TRP position

elementList.name: TRP Position Relative Geodetic
elementList.description: The configured estimated relative geodetic coordinate of the antenna of the cell/TRP

elementList.name: TRP Position Relative Cartesian
elementList.description: The configured estimated relative Cartesian coordinate of the antenna of the cell/TRP

elementList.name: DL-PRS Resource Coordinates
elementList.description: DL-PRS Resource Coordinates relative to the TRP coordinate

definitionList.name: DL-PRS Resource Coordinates
descriptionList:
This information element contains the
geographical coordinates of the antenna reference points (ARP) for the DL-PRS
Resources of a TRP.

elementList.name: CHOICE DL-PRS Resource Set ARP Location
elementList.description: Relative to the geographical coordinates for the TRP. If this IE is absent, the Relative Location is zero for the indicated DL-PRS Resource Set ID.

elementList.name: CHOICE DL-PRS Resource ARP Location
elementList.description: Relative to the DL-PRS Resource Set ARP Location. If this IE is absent, the Relative Location is zero for the indicated DL-PRS Resource ID.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no of DL-PRS resource sets per TRP.
  Value is 2.

Maximum no of DL-PRS resources of the DL-PRS
  resource set of the TRP. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: Relative Geodetic Location
descriptionList:
This information element provides a
location relative to some known reference location in a relative geodetic
coordinate system.

elementList.name: Milli-Arc-Second Units
elementList.description: Units and scale factor for the delta-latitude and delta-longitude fields, TS 37.355 [39].

elementList.name: Height Units
elementList.description: Units and scale factor for the delta-height field, TS 37.355 [39].

elementList.name: Delta Latitude
elementList.description: Delta value in latitude in the unit provided in Milli-Arc-Second Units, TS 37.355 [39].

elementList.name: Delta Longitude
elementList.description: Delta value in longitude in the unit provided in Milli-Arc-Second Units, TS 37.355 [39].

elementList.name: Delta Height
elementList.description: Delta value in ellipsoidal height in the unit provided in Height Units, TS 37.355 [39].

definitionList.name: Relative Cartesian Location
descriptionList:
This information element provides a
location relative to some known reference location in a relative Cartesian
coordinate.

elementList.name: X value
elementList.description: Positive value represents easting from reference point, in units of XYZ Unit IE.

elementList.name: Y value
elementList.description: Positive value represents northing from reference point in units of XYZ Unit IE.

elementList.name: Z value
elementList.description: Height with respect to reference point in units of XYZ Unit IE, where the XY-plane is horizontal and the Z-axis points up.

definitionList.name: Reference Point
descriptionList:
This information element provides a
reference point location information.

elementList.name: CHOICE ReferencePoint
elementList.description: Reference point to which relative location information is related to

elementList.name: Coordinate ID
elementList.description: Referential ID mapped via OAM

elementList.name: Reference Point High Accuracy Access Position
elementList.reference: NG-RAN High Accuracy Access Point Position 9.3.1.190

definitionList.name: Location Uncertainty
descriptionList:
This information element provides the
location uncertainty information.

elementList.name: Horizontal Uncertainty
elementList.description: Horizontal uncertainty of the ARP latitude/longitude. Corresponds to the encoded high accuracy uncertainty as defined in TS 23.032 [36]

elementList.name: Horizontal Confidence
elementList.description: Corresponds to confidence as defined in TS 23.032 [36].

elementList.name: Vertical Uncertainty
elementList.description: Vertical uncertainty of the ARP altitude. Corresponds to the encoded high accuracy uncertainty as defined in TS 23.032 [36]

elementList.name: Vertical Confidence
elementList.description: Corresponds to confidence as defined in TS 23.032 [36].

definitionList.name: NG-RAN High Accuracy Access Point Position
descriptionList:
The NG-RAN High Accuracy Access Point Position IE is used to
identify the geographical position of an NG-RAN Access Point. It is expressed
as High Accuracy Ellipsoid point with altitude and uncertainty ellipsoid
according to TS 23.032 [36].

definitionList.name: Positioning Broadcast Cells
descriptionList:
This IE is
used to indicate the cells that are requested to broadcast, or failed to
broadcast, the associated posSIB(s).

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of cells
  broadcasting a posSIB in a NB-DU. Value is 16384.

definitionList.name: SRS Configuration
descriptionList:
This information element contains the SRS configuration configured
by the gNB-CU for the UE.

elementList.name: Point A
elementList.description: NR ARFCN

elementList.name: Uplink Channel BW-PerSCS-List
elementList.description: SCS-SpecificCarrier TS 38.331 [8]

elementList.name: Offset To Carrier
elementList.description: First usable RB to Point A in the number of PRBs

elementList.name: Active UL BWP
elementList.description: Only the configuration in the active UL BWP is needed.

elementList.name: SRS Config
elementList.description: SRS-Config as defined in TS 38.331 [8]

elementList.name: SRS Resource
elementList.description: SRS-Resource as defined in TS 38.331 [8]

elementList.name: Positioning SRS Resource
elementList.description: SRS-PosResource-r16 as defined in TS 38.331 [8]

elementList.name: SRS Resource Set
elementList.description: SRS-ResourceSet as defined in TS 38.331 [8]

elementList.name: Positioning SRS Resource Set
elementList.description: SRS-PosResourceSet-r16 as defined in TS 38.331 [8]

elementList.name: PCI
elementList.description: Physical Cell ID of the cell that contains the SRS carrier

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of carriers for SRS. Value is 32.

Maximum no of SCS spacings for a carrier. Value
  is 5.

Maximum no of SRS resources per UL BWP. Value
  is 64.

Maximum no of positioning SRS resources per UL
  BWP. Value is 64.
Maximum no of SRS resource sets. Value is 16.

Maximum no of positioning SRS resource sets per
  UL BWP. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: SRS Resource
descriptionList:
This information element contains the SRS
resource.

elementList.name: Periodicity
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(slot1, slot2, slot4, slot5, slot8, slot10, slot16, slot20, slot32, slot40, slot64, slot80, slot160, slot320, slot640, slot1280, slot2560, …)

elementList.name: Periodicity
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(slot1, slot2, slot4, slot5, slot8, slot10, slot16, slot20, slot32, slot40, slot64, slot80, slot160, slot320, slot640, slot1280, slot2560, …)

definitionList.name: Positioning SRS Resource
descriptionList:
This information element contains the SRS
resource for positioning.

elementList.name: Periodicity
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(slot1, slot2, slot4, slot5, slot8, slot10, slot16, slot20, slot32, slot40, slot64, slot80, slot160, slot320, slot640, slot1280, slot2560, slot5120, slot10240, slot40960, slot81920,…)

elementList.name: Periodicity
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(slot1, slot2, slot4, slot5, slot8, slot10, slot16, slot20, slot32, slot40, slot64, slot80, slot160, slot320, slot640, slot1280, slot2560, slot5120, slot10240, slot20480, slot40960, slot81920,…)

definitionList.name: SRS Resource Set
descriptionList:
This information element indicates a SRS
resource set in the UE for UL SRS transmission.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no of SRS resources per SRS resource
  set. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: Positioning SRS Resource Set
descriptionList:
This information element indicates a
positioning SRS resource set in the UE for UL SRS transmission.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no of positioning SRS resources per
  positioning SRS resource set. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: TRP ID
descriptionList:
The TRP ID IE is used to identify a TRP uniquely within a
gNB-CU.

elementList.name: TRP Identifier
elementList.description: Identifies a TRP within an gNB-CU

definitionList.name: NR-PRS Beam Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains spatial direction
information of the DL-PRS Resources.

elementList.name: PRS Resource Set ID
elementList.description: The resource set in which the resources are associated with the angle.

elementList.name: NR PRS Azimuth fine
elementList.description: Fine angles

elementList.name: NR PRS Elevation fine
elementList.description: Fine angles

elementList.name: LCS to GCS Translation List
elementList.description: If absent, the azimuth and elevation are provided in GCS.

elementList.name: Alpha-fine
elementList.description: Fine angles

elementList.name: Beta-fine
elementList.description: Fine angles

elementList.name: Gamma-fine
elementList.description: Fine angles

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no of DL-PRS resource sets per TRP.
  Value is 2.

Maximum no of DL-PRS resources of the DL-PRS
  resource set of the TRP. Value is 64.

Maximum no. of LCS-GS-Translation-Parameters
  that can reported with one message. Value is 3. The
  current version of the specification supports 1.

definitionList.name: E-CID Measurement Result
descriptionList:
The purpose of this IE is to provide the
E-CID measurement result.

elementList.name: Geographical Coordinates
elementList.description: The configured estimated geographical position of the antenna of the cell.

elementList.name: Value Timing Advance NR
elementList.description: As defined in TS 38.215 [43]

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of measured quantities that can be
  configured and reported with one message. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: Cell Portion ID
descriptionList:
This IE gives the current Cell Portion
associated with the target UE. The Cell Portion ID is the unique identifier
for a cell portion within a cell.

definitionList.name: Pathloss Reference Information
descriptionList:
This information element indicates a
pathloss reference for transmission of UL SRS by a UE.

definitionList.name: SSB Information
descriptionList:
This information element contains the SSB
time/frequency information for the TRPs.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no of SSBs for which the configuration
  can be provided. Value is 255.

definitionList.name: SSB Time/Frequency Configuration
descriptionList: This information element contains the time and frequency configuration of an SSB.

elementList.name: SSB frequency
elementList.description: ARFCN

elementList.name: SSB Transmit power
elementList.description: EPRE of SSS

elementList.name: SSB periodicity
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(ms5, ms10, ms20, ms40, ms80, ms160, …)

definitionList.name: Search Window Information
descriptionList:
This information element contains search window information for the
TRP.

elementList.name: Expected Propagation Delay
elementList.description: Indicates when the SRS is expected to arrive in time at the TRP relative to the UL RTOA Reference Time. The UL RTOA Reference Time for a target SRS is defined as , where - is the SFN Initialisation Time - , where and are the system frame number and the subframe number of the SRS, respectively. Granularity 4Ts, where Ts=1/(15×103 ×2048) seconds. Centre of the search window.

elementList.name: Delay Uncertainty
elementList.description: Indicates the uncertainty of the expected SRS arrival time at the TRP Granularity 4Ts, where Ts=1/(15×103×2048) seconds. Single-sided search window.

definitionList.name: Extended gNB-DU Name
descriptionList:
This IE provides extended human readable
name of the gNB-DU.

definitionList.name: Extended gNB-CU Name
descriptionList:
This IE provides extended human readable
name of the gNB-CU.

definitionList.name: F1-C Transfer Path
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the transmission path of
the F1-C traffic.

elementList.name: F1-C Path NSA
elementList.description: This IE indicates the transmission path of the F1-C traffic in EN-DC.

definitionList.name: SFN Offset
descriptionList:
This IE contains the time offset between an
absolute time reference and the SFN0 start. The IE is calculated assuming that
the SFN transmission started at the absolute time reference. The absolute time
reference chosen is the 1980-01-06 T00:00:19
International Atomic Time (TAI).

elementList.name: SFN Time Offset
elementList.description: Time offset in microseconds between the absolute time reference "1980-01-06 T00:00:19 International Atomic Time (TAI)” and the SFN0 start. The maximum usable value is (1024*10^4-1). Values higher than the maximum are discarded.

definitionList.name: Transmission Stop Indicator
descriptionList:
This IE indicates to stop the data
transmission at gNB-DU side for an DRB not subject to DAPS Handover.

definitionList.name: Spatial Relation Information per SRS Resource
descriptionList:
This information element indicates a
spatial relation for transmission of each UL SRS
resource recommened by LMF.

elementList.name: Spatial Relation per SRS Resource List
Spatial Relation per SRS Resource Item

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no of SRS resources per SRS resource
  set. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: CCO Assistance Information
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Capacity and Coverage
(CCO) actions for specific CCO issues detected.

elementList.name: CCO issue detection
elementList.description: Indicates the type of CCO issue detected

definitionList.name: Affected Cells and Beams
descriptionList:
This IE includes a list of cells and/or
SS/PBCH block indexes affected by the detected CCO issue.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum numbers of cells affected by a CCO
  issue. Value is 32.

Maximum no. SSB Areas that can be served by a
  NG-RAN node cell. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: Coverage Modification Notification
descriptionList:
This IE includes a list of cells and/or
SS/PBCH block indexes with the corresponding coverage configuration selected by
the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: Cell Coverage State
elementList.description: Value '0' indicates that the cell is inactive. Other values Indicates that the cell is active and also indicates the coverage configuration of the concerned cell.

elementList.name: SSB Coverage State
elementList.description: Value '0' indicates that the SS/PBCH block is inactive. Other values Indicates that the SS/PBCH block is active and also indicates the coverage configuration of the concerned SS/PBCH block.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum numbers of cells that can be served by
  a gNB-DU. Value is 512.

Maximum no. SSB Areas that can be served by a
  NG-RAN node cell. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: Cells for SON List
descriptionList:
This IE contains a
list of served cells in potential PRACH conflict and it may contain neighbour
cell PRACH configuration.

elementList.name: Neighbour NR Cells for SON List

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum numbers of served cells where PRACH conflict is possible. Value is
  256.

definitionList.name: Neighbour NR Cells for SON List
descriptionList:
This IE contains the
configuration of NR neighbour cells which the gNB-DU may take into consideration
for SON purposes.

NOTE:      If multiple
served cells share a common neighbour cell and thus multiple copies of Neighbour
NR Cells for SON Item IE for the neighbour cell are needed to be contained
in an F1AP message, IEs other than the NR CGI IE may be omitted in the
copies other than the first one present in the message.

elementList.name: Neighbour NR Cells for SON Item

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum numbers of neighbour
  cells which the gNB-DU may
  take into consideration for SON purposes on a given served cell. Value is 32.

definitionList.name: NR Mode Info Rel16
descriptionList:
This IE contains the information of a NR cell which needs to be encoded
differently for FDD and TDD.

elementList.name: TDD DL-UL Configuration Common NR
elementList.description: The tdd-UL-DL-ConfigurationCommon as defined in TS 38.331 [8]

definitionList.name: Frequency Info Rel16
descriptionList:
This IE contains the information of a NR cell which should
be encoded separately among FDD NDL, FDD NUL, TDD NDL+NUL and SUL.
