elementList.name: NR ARFCN
elementList.description: RF Reference Frequency as defined in TS 38.104 [17] section 5.4.2.1. The frequency provided in this IE identifies the absolute frequency position of the reference resource block (Common RB 0) of the carrier. Its lowest subcarrier is also known as Point A.

elementList.name: Frequency Shift 7p5khz
elementList.description: Indicate whether the value of Δshift is 0kHz or 7.5kHz when calculating FREF,shift as defined in Section 5.4.2.1 of TS 38.104 [17].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum value of NR ARFCNs. Value is 3279165.

definitionList.name: MBS Session ID
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the MBS Session ID uniquely
identifies the MBS Service.

elementList.name: TMGI
elementList.description: Coded as Temporary Mobile Group Identity (TMGI) defined in TS 23.003 [23].

definitionList.name: gNB-CU MBS F1AP ID
descriptionList:
The gNB-CU MBS F1AP ID uniquely identifies
the MBS association over the F1 interface within the gNB-CU.

NOTE:     If F1-C signalling transport is shared
among multiple interface instances, the value of the gNB-CU MBS F1AP ID is
allocated so that it can be associated with the
corresponding F1-C interface instance.

definitionList.name: gNB-DU MBS F1AP ID
descriptionList:
The gNB-DU MBS F1AP ID uniquely identifies
the MBS association over the F1 interface within the gNB-DU.

NOTE:     If F1-C signalling transport is shared
among multiple interface instances, the value of the gNB-DU MBS F1AP ID is
allocated so that it can be associated with the
corresponding F1-C interface instance.

definitionList.name: MBS Area Session ID
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Area Session ID for
MBS Session with location dependent context.

definitionList.name: MBS Service Area
descriptionList: This IE contains the MBS service area.

elementList.name: MBS Service Area Information Location Dependent List

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of MBS Service Area Information
  elements in the MBS Service Area Information Location Dependent List IE.
  Value is 512
  Editor’s Note: this value is FFS.

definitionList.name: MBS Service Area information
descriptionList:
This IE contains MBS service area
information.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of cells allowed within one MBS
  Service Area. Value is 8192. Editor’s Note: whether
  this constant should actually exceed the maximum number of cells a DU can
  support is to be further discussed.

Maximum no. of TAs allowed within one MBS Service Area. Value is 1024. Editor’s
  Note: whether this constant should actually exceed the maximum number of
  cells a DU can support is to be further discussed.

definitionList.name: MRB ID
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the MRB ID uniquely
identifies the MRB setup for the MBS service.

definitionList.name: MBS CU to DU RRC Information
descriptionList: This IE indicates the MBS CU to DU RRC Information.

elementList.name: mtch-neighbourCell
elementList.description: mtch-neighbourCell, as defined in TS 38.331[8]

elementList.name: MRB PDCP Config Broadcast
elementList.description: MRB-PDCP-ConfigBroadcast, as defined in TS 38.331[8]

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. cells that can be served by a
  gNB-DU. Value is 512.

definitionList.name: MBS Broadcast Neighbour Cell List
descriptionList:
This IE indicates a
list of neighbour cells where ongoing MBS sessions provided via broadcast MRB
in the current cells are also provided.

elementList.name: MBS Broadcast Neighbour Cell List
elementList.description: MBS-NeighbourCellList, as defined in TS 38.331[8]

definitionList.name: IAB Congestion Indication
descriptionList:
This IE contains
the IAB downlink congestion indication. This IE is only applicable if the UE is an
IAB-MT.

elementList.name: Child Node Identifier
elementList.description: This IE identifies the child node, the link to which is congested.

elementList.name: BH RLC CH ID
elementList.description: This IE identifies the congested BH RLC channel over the link towards the node identified by the Child Node Identifier IE.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of congestion indications, the
  maximum value is 1024.

Maximum no. of BH RLC channels allowed towards
  one IAB-node, the maximum value is 65536.

definitionList.name: F1-C Transfer Path NRDC
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the transmission path of
the F1-C traffic in NR-DC. This IE is only applicable if the UE is an
IAB-MT.

elementList.name: F1-C Path NRDC
elementList.description: This IE indicates the transmission path of the F1-C traffic in NR-DC.

definitionList.name: IAB TNL Address Exception
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the list of TNL
addresses, pertaining to the packets to be forwarded via the tunnel by the
IAB-donor-DU.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of individual IPv4/IPv6 addresses
  or IPv6 address prefixes in one procedure execution. The value is 1024.

definitionList.name: RB Set Configuration
descriptionList:
This IE contains the
RB Set Configuration. The IE is only applicable if
the gNB-DU is an IAB-DU.

elementList.name: Subcarrier Spacing
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (kHz15, kHz30, kHz60, kHz120, kHz240, spare3, spare2, spare1, …)
elementList.description: Subcarrier spacing used as reference for the RB set configuration.

elementList.name: RB Set Size
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (rb2, rb4, rb8, rb16, rb32, rb64)
elementList.description: Number of PRBs in each RB set.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of RB sets per IAB-DU or
  IAB-donor-DU cell. Value is 8.

Maximum no. of Physical Resource Blocks. Value
  is 275.

definitionList.name: Survival Time
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Survival Time of the
TSC QoS flow as defined in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Survival Time
elementList.description: Expressed in units of 1 us.

definitionList.name: PDC Measurement Result
descriptionList:
The purpose of this IE is to provide the
PDC measurement result.

elementList.name: NR PDC Timing Advance
elementList.description: Value is expressed in unit of [64*] ns

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of measured quantities that can be
  configured and reported with one message. Value is 16. Maximum is 1 in this
  release.

definitionList.name: SCG Activation Request
descriptionList:
This IE indicates whether the SCG resources
are required to be activated or deactivated.

definitionList.name: SCG Activation Status
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the status of SCG
resources.

definitionList.name: Requested DL PRS Transmission Characteristics
descriptionList:
This IE contains the requested PRS
configuration for transmission by the gNB-CU.

elementList.name: Resource Set Start Time and Duration
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Start Time and Duration IE is present

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of PRS resources set. Value is 8.

Maximum no of PRS resources per PRS resource
  set. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: Start Time and Duration
descriptionList:
This IE contains the start time and/or
duration for the on-demand DL-PRS.

elementList.name: Duration
elementList.description: Unit: seconds

definitionList.name: PRS Transmission Off Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains the information to turn
off particular PRS transmissions.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of PRS resources set. Value is 8.

Maximum no of PRS resources per PRS resource
  set. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: UL-AoA Assistance Information
descriptionList:
This information element contains the
expected uplink Angle of Arrival and uncertainty range.

elementList.name: Expected Azimuth AoA
elementList.description: Defined as (φAOA - ΔφAOA/2, φAOA + ΔφAOA/2)

elementList.name: Expected Azimuth AoA Value
elementList.description: φAOA component of Expected Azimuth AoA

elementList.name: Expected Azimuth AoA Uncertainty Range
elementList.description: ΔφAOA component of Expected Azimuth AoA

elementList.name: Expected Zenith AoA
elementList.description: Defined as (θZOA – ΔθZOA/2, θZOA + ΔθZOA/2)

elementList.name: Expected Zenith AoA Value
elementList.description: θZOA component of Expected Zenith AoA

elementList.name: Expected Zenith AoA Uncertainty Range
elementList.description: ΔθZOA component of Expected Zenith AoA

elementList.name: Expected UL Angle of Arrival Zenith Only
elementList.description: Defined as (θZOA – ΔθZOA/2, θZOA + ΔθZOA/2)

elementList.name: Expected Zenith AoA Value
elementList.description: θZOA component of Expected Zenith AoA

elementList.name: Expected Zenith AoA Uncertainty Range
elementList.description: ΔθZOA component of Expected Zenith AoA

elementList.name: LCS to GCS Translation AoA
elementList.description: If absent, the azimuth and zenith are provided in GCS.

definitionList.name: Zenith Angle of Arrival Information
descriptionList:
This information element contains the Zenith
Angle of Arrival, which can correspond to linear array measurement.

elementList.name: LCS to GCS Translation AoA
elementList.description: If absent, the zenith is provided in GCS. the z-axis of LCS is defined along the linear array axis

definitionList.name: On-demand PRS TRP Information
descriptionList:
This IE
contains on-demand PRS information for the TRP.

elementList.name: On-demand PRS Request Allowed
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap represents an on-demand PRS transmission parameter: first bit: Resource Set Periodicity second bit: PRS Bandwidth third bit: Resource Repetition Factor fourth bit: Resource Number of Symbols fifth bit: Comb Size sixth bit: Number of Frequency Layers seventh bit: Start Time and Duration eighth bit: Off Indication ninth bit: QCL Information Other bits reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘request allowed’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘request not allowed’.

elementList.name: Allowed Resource Set Periodicity Values
elementList.description: This IE applies only if the first bit of the On-demand PRS Request Allowed IE is set to ‘1’. Each position in the bitmap represents a value of the Resource Set Periodicity IE defined in subclause 9.2.x1, first bit = 4 and so on. Bits 21-24 are reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘request allowed’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘request not allowed’. If this IE is absent, all Resource Set Periodicity values are allowed to be requested.

elementList.name: Allowed PRS Bandwidth Values
elementList.description: This IE applies only if the second bit of the On-demand PRS Request Allowed IE is set to ‘1’. Each position in the bitmap represents a value of the PRS Bandwidth IE defined in subclause 9.2.x1, first bit = 1 and so on. Bit 64 is reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘request allowed’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘request not allowed’. If this IE is absent, all PRS Bandwidth values are allowed to be requested.

elementList.name: Allowed Resource Repetition Factor Values
elementList.description: This IE applies only if the third bit of the On-demand PRS Request Allowed IE is set to ‘1’. Each position in the bitmap represents a value of the Resource Repetition Factor IE defined in subclause 9.2.x1, first bit = rf1 and so on. Bit 8 is reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘request allowed’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘request not allowed’. If this IE is absent, all Resource Repetition Factor values are allowed to be requested.

elementList.name: Allowed Resource Number of Symbols Values
elementList.description: This IE applies only if the fourth bit of the On-demand PRS Request Allowed IE is set to ‘1’. Each position in the bitmap represents a value of the Resource Number of Symbols IE defined in subclause 9.2.x1, first bit = n2 and so on. Bits 5-8 are reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘request allowed’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘request not allowed’. If this IE is absent, all Resource Number of Symbols values are allowed to be requested.

elementList.name: Allowed Comb Size Values
elementList.description: This IE applies only if the fifth bit of the On-demand PRS Request Allowed IE is set to ‘1’. Each position in the bitmap represents a value of the Comb Size IE defined in subclause 9.2.x1, first bit = 2 and so on. Bits 5-8 are reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘request allowed’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘request not allowed’. If this IE is absent, all Comb Size values are allowed to be requested.

definitionList.name: LCS to GCS Translation AoA
descriptionList:
This IE contains the
LCS to GCS Translation information.

definitionList.name: Response Time
descriptionList:
This information element contains the response time of the measurement results
reporting.

definitionList.name: ARP Location Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains the relative position of
ARP(s) to the TRP.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of ARPs
  associated with a TRP. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: ARP ID
descriptionList:
This IE is used to uniquely identify an ARP
associated with a TRP.

definitionList.name: Multiple UL AoA
descriptionList:
This information element contains the list
of the multiple UL AOAs values.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no of UL-AOAs values (pair of AOA &
  ZOA values) that can be reported. Value is 8

definitionList.name: UL SRS-RSRPP
descriptionList:
This information element contains the UL
SRS RSRPP measurement.

definitionList.name: SRS Resource type
descriptionList: This IE contains the SRS resource type.

definitionList.name: Extended Additional Path List
descriptionList:
This IE contains the extended additional
path results of time measurement.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  of additional path measurement. Value is 8.

definitionList.name: LoS/NLoS Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains the LoS/NLoS information for
UL measurement.

elementList.name: LoS/NLoS Indicator Soft
elementList.description: Values provide the likelihood of a LOS propagation path in the range between 0 and 1 with 0.1 steps resolution. Value '0' indicates NLOS and value '1' indicates LOS.

definitionList.name: Requested DL-PRS Resource List
descriptionList:
This IE contains the requested DL-PRS
resource list.

elementList.name: Requested DL-PRS Resource List
elementList.description: NR-DL-PRS-Resource-r16 as defined in TS 37.355 [39]

elementList.name: QCL Source PRS Resource Set ID

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no of PRS resources per PRS resource
  set. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: UE Tx TEG Association
descriptionList:
This
information element contains the UE Tx TEG association.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no of reported UE Tx TEG association.
  Value is 8.

Maximum no of SRS Resources per set. Value is
  16.

definitionList.name: TRP Tx TEG Association
descriptionList:
This
information element contains the TRP Tx TEG information.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no of reported TRP Tx TEG association.
  Value is 8.

Maximum no of DL-PRS resources of the DL-PRS
  resource set of the TRP. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: TRP TEG ID Information
descriptionList:
This
information element contains the TRP RxTx TEG ID group information.

definitionList.name: Measurement Characteristics Request Indicator
descriptionList:
This IE contains the measurement
characteristic information requested by the gNB-CU.

elementList.name: Measurement characteristic request indicator
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap represents a requested measurement characteristic: first bit: Measurement Beam Information Second bit: Extended Additional Path List Third bit: Additional Path Power Fourth Bit: Multiple UL AoA of Additional Path Fifth bit: LoS/NLoS Information Sixth bit: TRP Rx TEG association for UL-TDOA Seventh bit: TRP RxTxTEG-ID information for DL+UL positioning. Eighth bit: SRS Resource Type Other bits reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘requested measurement characteristic’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘not requested’.

definitionList.name: UE Reporting Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains the UE Reporting
Information.

elementList.name: Reporting Amount
elementList.description: Value 0 represents an infinite number of periodic reporting

definitionList.name: TRP Beam Antenna Information
descriptionList:
The IE provides the beam antenna
information of the TRP. It includes either the explicit beam antenna
information, or a reference to another TRP’s signalled configuration, or the indication
that no change has occurred with respect to previously signalled
configuration..

elementList.name: CHOICE TRP Beam Antenna Info Item
Associated TRP ID
elementList.description: This IE specifies the TRP ID of the associated TRP from which the beam information parameters are adopted.

elementList.name: LCS to GCS Translation AOA
elementList.description: Included if the azimuth and elevation are not provided in GCS.

elementList.name: No Change
elementList.description: No change compared to previously signalled configuration for this TRP.

definitionList.name: TRP Beam Antenna Angles
descriptionList:
The IE provides the beam antenna
information of the TRP.

elementList.name: TRP Azimuth Angle
elementList.description: Scale factor 0.1 deg. For GCS, the azimuth angle is measured counter-clockwise from geographical North. For LCS, the azimuth angle is measured counter-clockwise from the x-axis of the LCS.

elementList.name: TRP Elevation Angle
elementList.description: Scale factor 0.1 deg. For GCS, the elevation angle is measured relative to zenith and positive to the horizontal direction (elevation 0 deg. points to zenith, 90 deg to the horizon). For LCS, the elevation angle is measured relative to the z-axis of the LCS (elevation 0 deg. points to the z-axis, 90 deg to the x-y plane).

elementList.name: TRP Beam Power List
elementList.description: Relative power between DL-PRS Resources for the given Azimuth and Elevation Angle. The first Relative Power element in this list provides the peak power for this Azimuth/Elevation angle and is defined as 0dB power. All the remaining Relative Power Element's in this list provide the relative DL-PRS Resource power relative to this first element in the list.

elementList.name: PRS Resource Set ID
elementList.description: DL-PRS Resource Set ID of the DL-PRS Resource for which the Relative Power is provided. If this field is absent, the DL-PRS Resource Set ID for this instance of the Beam Power List is the same as the DL-PRS Resource Set ID of the previous instance in the Beam Power List. This field shall be included at least in the first instance of the Beam Power List.

elementList.name: PRS Resource ID
elementList.description: DL-PRS Resource for which the Relative Power is provided.

elementList.name: Relative Power
elementList.description: Scale factor -0.1 dB

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum number of DL-PRS Resources per angle
  per TRP. Value is 512.

Maximum number of azimuth angles per TRP. Value
  is 3600.

Maximum number of elevation angles per azimuth
  angle/TRP. Value is 1801.

definitionList.name: NR Paging eDRX Information
descriptionList: This IE indicates the NR Paging eDRX parameters for RRC_IDLE as defined in TS 38.304 [24].

elementList.name: NR Paging eDRX Cycle Idle
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(hfquarter, hfhalf, hf1, hf2, hf4, hf8, hf16, hf32, hf64, hf128, hf256, hf512, hf1024, …)
elementList.description: TeDRX,CN defined in TS 38.304 [24]. Unit: [number of hyperframes].

elementList.name: NR Paging Time Window
elementList.description: Unit: [1.28 second].

definitionList.name: NR Paging eDRX Information for RRC INACTIVE
descriptionList: This IE indicates the NR Paging eDRX parameters for RRC_INACTIVE as defined in TS 38.304 [24].

elementList.name: NR Paging eDRX Cycle Inactive
elementList.description: TeDRX,RAN defined in TS 38.304 [24]. Unit: [number of hyperframes].

definitionList.name: QoE Metrics
descriptionList: This IE provides the RAN visible QoE measurement report to gNB-DU.

elementList.name: Buffer Level
elementList.description: As defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Playout Delay
elementList.description: As defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: CG-SDT Session Info
descriptionList: This IE identifies an CG-SDT session for a UE.

definitionList.name: SDT Information
descriptionList:
This IE is used to indicate an SDT
transaction and to provide the assistant information from the UE.

elementList.name: SDT Assistant Information
elementList.description: “single packet” indicates no subsequent SDT transmission is expected. “multiple packets” indicates subsequent SDT transmission is expected.

definitionList.name: Path Switch Configuration
descriptionList:
This IE provides information for switching
to an indirect path from a direct path.

elementList.name: Target Relay UE ID
elementList.description: Corresponding to SL-SourceIdentity-r17, defined in TS 38.331 [8]

elementList.name: Txxxx
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (ms50, ms100, ms150, ms200, ms500, ms1000, ms2000, ms10000)
elementList.description: Corresponding to txxx-r17, defined in TS 38.331 [8]

definitionList.name: Sidelink Relay Configuration
descriptionList:
This IE provides information of a U2N
Remote UE when accessing the network via a U2N Relay UE.

elementList.name: gNB-DU UE F1AP ID of Relay UE
Sidelink Configuration Container
elementList.description: SL-PHY-MAC-RLC-Config IE as defined in subclause x in TS 38.331 [8]. Required at least to carry PC5 RLC channel configurations for remote UE’s SRB1.

definitionList.name: PC5 RLC Channel ID
descriptionList:
This IE uniquely identifies a PC5 RLC channel for a L2 U2N Remote UE or a
L2 U2N Relay UE.

definitionList.name: Uu RLC Channel ID
descriptionList: This IE uniquely identifies a Uu RLC channel for a L2 U2N Relay UE.

definitionList.name: Remote UE Local ID
descriptionList:
This IE uniquely identifies a L2 U2N Remote
UE within the connected Relay UE.

elementList.name: Remote UE Local ID
elementList.description: Corresponds to the sl-LocalIdentity defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: 5G ProSe Authorized
descriptionList:
This IE provides
information on the authorization status of the UE for NR ProSe services.

elementList.name: 5G ProSe Direct Discovery
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized for 5G ProSe Direct Discovery

elementList.name: 5G ProSe Direct Communication
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized for 5G ProSe Direct Communication

elementList.name: 5G ProSe Layer-2 UE-to-Network Relay
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized for 5G ProSe Layer-2 UE-to-Network Relay

elementList.name: 5G ProSe Layer-3 UE-to-Network Relay
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized for 5G ProSe Layer-3 UE-to-Network Relay

elementList.name: 5G ProSe Layer-2 Remote UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized for 5G ProSe Layer-2 Remote UE

definitionList.name: PEIPS Assistance Information
descriptionList:
This IE provides the information related to
CN paging subgrouping for a particular UE, as specified in TS 38.304 [24].

definitionList.name: UE Paging Capability
descriptionList: This IE provides the UE Paging Capability information needed for paging.

definitionList.name: gNB-DU UE Slice Maximum Bit Rate List
descriptionList:
This IE contains the UE Slice Maximum Bit
Rate List as specified in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: UE Slice Maximum Bit Rate Item
UE Slice Maximum Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: This IE indicates the UE-Slice-MBR as specified in TS 23.501 [21] in the uplink direction.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of SLICE MAXIMUM BIT RATE values
  for a UE. Value is 8.

definitionList.name: UP Transport Layer Information
descriptionList:
The UP Transport Layer Information
IE identifies an F1 transport bearer associated to a DRB. It contains a
Transport Layer Address and a GTP Tunnel Endpoint Identifier. The Transport
Layer Address is an IP address to be used for the F1 user plane transport. The
GTP Tunnel Endpoint Identifier is to be used for the user plane transport
between gNB-CU and gNB-DU.

definitionList.name: GTP-TEID
descriptionList:
The GTP-TEID IE is the GTP Tunnel
Endpoint Identifier to be used for the user plane transport between the gNB-CU
and gNB-DU.

elementList.name: GTP-TEID
elementList.description: For details and range, see TS 29.281 [18].

definitionList.name: Transport Layer Address
descriptionList:
This Transport Layer Address IE is
an IP address.

elementList.name: Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: The Radio Network Layer is not supposed to interpret the address information. It should pass it to the Transport Layer for interpretation. For details, see TS 38.414 [19].

definitionList.name: CP Transport Layer Information
descriptionList:
This IE is used to provide the F1 control
plane transport layer information associated with a gNB-CU – gNB-DU.

definitionList.name: Transport Layer Address Info
descriptionList:
This IE is used for signalling TNL Configuration
information for IPSec tunnel over which GTP traffic is transmitted.

elementList.name: Transport UP Layer Address Info to Add List
Transport UP Layer Address Info to Add Item
IP-Sec Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: Transport Layer Address for IP-Sec endpoint.

elementList.name: GTP Transport Layer Address To Add List
GTP Transport Layer Address To Add Item
GTP Transport Layer Address Info
elementList.description: GTP Transport Layer Address for GTP end-points.

elementList.name: Transport UP Layer Address Info to Remove List
Transport UP Layer Address Info to Remove Item
IP-Sec Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: Transport Layer Address for IP-Sec endpoint.

elementList.name: GTP Transport Layer Address To Remove List
GTP Transport Layer Address To Remove Item
GTP Transport Layer Address Info
elementList.description: GTP Transport Layer Address for GTP end-points.

definitionList.name: URI
descriptionList:
This IE is
an URI.

elementList.name: URI
elementList.description: String representing URI (Uniform Resource Identifier)

definitionList.name: BC Bearer Context F1-U TNL Info
descriptionList:
This IE contains F1-U TNL information for
an MBS Session. In case of locaction dependent MBS sessions, it also contains
per Area Session ID F1-U TNL information.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of MBS Area Session IDs. Value is
  256.

definitionList.name: MBS Multicast F1-U Context Descriptor
descriptionList:
This IE contains CU F1-U TNL information
for an MBS Session. It may also contain per Area Session ID, per cell or a UE
reference for support of ptp MRB configurations F1-U TNL information.

elementList.name: MBS PTP UE Reference
elementList.description: UE reference for a F1-U bearer established for issuing a PDCP Status Report and subsequent retransmission

elementList.name: MBS PTP UE Reference
elementList.description: UE reference for a F1-U bearer established for support of an ptp-only MRB configuration

definitionList.name: MBS PTP UE Reference
descriptionList:
This IE contains information to associate
an F1-U bearer established for a UE for either retransmitting PDCP PDUs or to
support a ptp-only MRB configuration.
